records.name: Agumon
records.profile: A cheerful Digimon who uses its hard claws as weapons. Hidden in its small body lies boundless courage, a fearless personality, and an uncharted potential for growth.

records.name: Gabumon
records.profile: A Digimon that wears Garurumon’s fur and is normally very shy. However, wearing the fur inverts its personality and makes it bold. Its weapons are its stiff horn and the sharp claws attached to the fur.

records.name: Greymon
records.profile: A Digimon with a strong body and a hard, fine horn that boasts high combat power. Its head is covered with a hard shell that increases its defensive ability. It is also skilled at cooperating with its friends in combat.

records.name: Monochromon
records.profile: A Digimon whose shell and horns are hard as diamond. They say when its horns are completely grown, they will reach half the size of its body. It is an herbivorous and calm Digimon, but when it gets angry it goes on a rampage.

records.name: Centalmon
records.profile: A Digimon with the upper body of a human and the lower body of an animal. Each part of its body is covered in blue armor. It releases compressed gas through the pipe on its back to help it reach close to the speed of sound.

records.name: Leomon
records.profile: A Digimon praised as a noble hero. It is a warrior with a just heart who has defeated many atrocious Digimon. Its rival is Orgemon. On its waist, it carries a magical sword called ’Shishiou-maru’.

records.name: Garurumon
records.profile: A Digimon covered with fur as hard as mithril. It is feared by other Digimon because it hunts its prey with a carnivore’s speed and very precise attacks.

records.name: Unimon
records.profile: A synthetic Digimon with a unicorn’s horn and a pegasus’ wings. Its wings help it fly freely within the network, and its sharp horn helps it fight its enemies. It has a very wild temper.

records.name: Pandamon
records.profile: A Digimon that looks like a panda but is not very popular because of its bluntness. It pretends to be a maverick, but it secretly yearns to be like the popular Monzaemon. Surprisingly, it is actually very capable.

records.name: Weregarurumon
records.profile: A commando-type Digimon that has the leg strength of Garurumon and skilled war tactics. Its jumping abilities are top tier. It has a strong sense of duty and serves its master and partners faithfully.

records.name: Mammon
records.profile: An ancient Digimon, discovered in the melted ice and snow due to the Digital World warming. On its mask there is a crystal of knowledge which gives it the power of clairvoyance and allows it to see far into the future.

records.name: Metalgreymon
records.profile: A Digimon with over half of its body mechanized. It is said to have the power of a nuclear warhead. Only a Greymon who has won numerous battles can evolve to this stage.

records.name: Skullgreymon
records.profile: A menacing Digimon obsessed with fighting. Thanks to its battle instincts, it continues to fight even though it is nothing but bones. It is feared by other Digimon because it has no intelligence and fights indiscriminately.

records.name: Saberleomon
records.profile: An ancient Digimon that is said to be the ancestor of Leomon. It is a huge beast with overwhelmingly destructive claws, strong penetrative tusks, and legs that allow it to run at Mach speed.

records.name: Baalmon
records.profile: An enlightened Digimon called ’The Noble King’. It encompasses all knowledge. The charms attached to its mantle contain the solutions to all possible problems. It serves as general of the Bagra army.

records.name: Metalgarurumon
records.profile: A Digimon whose whole body is mechanized. It is the final form of Garurumon. It retains Garurumon’s speed despite the many heavy firearms attached to its body. It finds its enemies with the laser on the tip of its nose and swiftly shoots them down.

records.name: Wargreymon
records.profile: A Digimon equipped with Dramon Killers on both its arms and the Brave Shield on its back. It is a veteran hero wearing armor made of Chrome Digizoid. It has a humanoid shape and is remarkably powerful and fast.

records.name: Hagurumon
records.profile: A mutant Digimon made of a combination of gears. Removing even one gear is enough to make it stop working. It has the deadly skill of manipulating other Digimon, which it uses in mischievous ways.

records.name: Kokuwamon
records.profile: A mini insect machine Digimon. It has electricity stored in its body and can use this to even run domestic appliances. In crisis situations, it can release a current of 1 MV to protect its body.

records.name: Revolmon
records.profile: A Digimon with a strong sense of justice. It belongs to the Virus Busters and deletes evil Digimon. However, since it likes gambling, it pardons evil Digimon who win the Russian roulette.

records.name: Tankmon
records.profile: A Digimon that enjoys fighting so much its nickname is ’the Mercenary Digimon’. Heavy artillery is installed all throughout its body, which it likes using to shatter its enemies to pieces.

records.name: Guardromon
records.profile: A Digimon with outstanding defense. Originally it was guarding the network with Giromon the net-keeper, but it got infected by a virus and was used by evil Digimon.

records.name: Knightmon
records.profile: A loyal Digimon wearing armor made of Chrome Digizoid. It always disregards its own will and obeys the orders of its master. Depending on those orders, it can become either good or evil.

records.name: Andromon
records.profile: A cyborg Digimon created in an experiment. It has high combat power and strictly follows the orders it receives regardless of their good or evil nature.

records.name: Mugendramon
records.profile: A completely metal Digimon that was created by combining the parts of many cyborg Digimon. An evil program is written in its digicore and supplies it with infinite malice.

records.name: Tentomon
records.profile: A Digimon with a hard shell but an otherwise very peaceful personality. It is very easygoing and likes smelling the aroma of flowers and taking the occasional nap. It uses its claws deftly and can grab things like a human.

records.name: Palmon
records.profile: A rare type of Digimon that became a plant even though it started evolving like a reptile. A tropical plant blooms on its head and changes scents according to its mood. It buries its feet into the ground in order to absorb nutrients.

records.name: Gomamon
records.profile: A naughty Digimon that likes pranks. His body is covered with fur so that he can resist to cold temperatures. His claws help him break hard blocks of ice. When he gets angry, the red hair on his head bristles.

records.name: Piyomon
records.profile: A Digimon with wings that help it hold things but are unsuitable for flying. It can only fly at the same speed as Patamon. It aspires to someday become Birdramon, who can fly freely in the sky.

records.name: Kuwagamon
records.profile: A Digimon of the same maturity as Kabuterimon, its eternal rival. It has well-developed battle instincts. It attacks its prey immediately and grasps it in its scissors.

records.name: Kabuterimon
records.profile: A powerful insect Digimon with a hard shell. It boasts high defense due to its metallized head. It has no mercy when it attacks its rival Digimon.

records.name: Birdramon
records.profile: A Digimon dressed in a blazing flame and born of a firewall. It flies freely within the network. Its specialty is air attacks.

records.name: Togemon
records.profile: A plant Digimon that is easygoing and often absent-minded. However, when somebody upsets it, it angrily brings out its thorn-covered fists.

records.name: Airdramon
records.profile: An intelligent Digimon that flies freely in the sky. They say that its existence is close to the gods, especially when it calls up storms with its cry. Its fierce personality makes it difficult for ordinary tamers to use.

records.name: Atlurkabuterimon
records.profile: A Digimon discovered in the net area of the tropics. It is an evolved form of Kabuterimon. Its body is about 1.5 times that of Kabuterimon. Its fighting skills have improved thanks to the muscles it developed, but its flying skills dropped.

records.name: Oukuwamon
records.profile: An aggressive Digimon evolved from Kuwagamon. Its scissors have grown even stronger, and its scouting skills have improved due to an enhanced sense of touch. Its defensive abilities, which were not very developed in Kuwagamon, improved as well.

records.name: Garudamon
records.profile: A Digimon that loves justice and nature. It is the guardian god of earth and wind. Only bird Digimon with high intelligence and fighting ability can evolve into Garudamon. It is a close friend of Leomon, who shares its vision.

records.name: Megaseadramon
records.profile: A Digimon with an enlarged head, hard armor, and a blade in the shape of a lightning bolt. It also has a high level of intelligence and a very cautious personality, following its enemies until it brings them down.

records.name: Heraklekabuterimon
records.profile: An insect Digimon with a shining golden body. It has the features of both Kabuterimon and Kuwagamon. Its weapons are its huge horns and scissors, and it can fly at supersonic speed.

records.name: Grankuwagamon
records.profile: A dreadful Digimon called the devil of the deep forest. It is the final form of the Kuwagamon species. It lives in the depths of the forests and is fully nocturnal. Its eternal rival is Heraklekabuterimon.

records.name: Metalseadramon
records.profile: A Digimon fully covered in Chrome Digizoid alloy. It is the final form of the Seadramon species. It was adapted for use in interception and repels most attacks with its body.

records.name: Rosemon
records.profile: A beautiful female Digimon called the queen of flowers. On its breast it wears a Tiferet, a jewel in which is engraved the symbol of love and beauty. This jewel promises eternal beauty.

records.name: Impmon
records.profile: A Digimon that likes pranks and often plays them on electrical products. While it is cruel to its weak opponents, it also stubbornly faces enemies stronger than itself, rather than trying to curry favor with them. Ultimately, this Digimon is quite lonely.

records.name: Keramon
records.profile: A child Digimon that thinks destroying data is just a game. It destroys the computers it penetrates, eating away data at a rate of 100MB per second.

records.name: Candmon
records.profile: A Digimon with a burning digicore. It cannot survive if its digicore flame dies. For this reason, it is said that its true form is the flame. Although it is a flame-type, it has a calm personality.

records.name: Picodevimon
records.profile: A cunning Digimon that is said to have drawn Devimon to the dark side. It is used by its superiors, Devimon and Vamdemon, and does evil deeds for them.

records.name: Wizarmon
records.profile: A Digimon that came from Witchelny, a digital world in another dimension, in order to train. It is mastering the magic of earth and fire. It is very shy and doesn’t like to show its face.

records.name: Devimon
records.profile: A fallen angel Digimon. It originally belonged to the angel Digimon but fell to the dark side. It wears the symbol of evil engraved on its chest. It can control other Digimon using its evil intellect and fierce eyes.

records.name: Bakemon
records.profile: A ghost Digimon born from the dark area. It is made of a virus program that possesses computers and destroys them. It is said that inside its cloth there is a black hole.

records.name: Orgemon
records.profile: A Digimon hunter with a developed physique and high intelligence. Driven by its rage, it challenges strong Digimon to fight. It is not ashamed of its nickname and holds a bone club as proof that it has defeated Skullgreymon.

records.name: Meramon
records.profile: A Digimon whose whole body is shrouded in flames and was born from the firewall that protects the Internet. It has a violent temper, just like the flames that cover its body, and wants to burn everything.

records.name: Madleomon
records.profile: A frenzy Digimon who lost its own will. It is the result of extensive upgrading in order to obtain power. It relies on its physical strength and poisonous claws as it follows the orders it receives.

records.name: Bluemeramon
records.profile: A flame-type Digimon covered in blue flame. It burns at a higher temperature than Meramon. It has a rough personality and is hard to tame.

records.name: Deathmeramon
records.profile: A Digimon that overcame water and ice, the weak points of the Meramon species. A blue burning chain winds around its body. Its skilled attacks, defensive abilities, and burning temperature are all enhanced.

records.name: Fantomon
records.profile: A senior ghost Digimon which has the appearance of the god of death. It searches for its prey using the clairvoyant crystal hanging at its neck. It is said that the interior of the cloth covering its body leads to another dimension.

records.name: Infermon
records.profile: An atrocious Digimon capable of invading any network and destroying its data. Its defense is remarkably improved thanks to the limbs attached to its cocoon body.

records.name: Ladydevimon
records.profile: A female fallen angel Digimon that holds dark power of incomparable purity. It is impossible to control it using personal computers. Its enemy is Angewomon.

records.name: Vamdemon
records.profile: The king of the Undead Digimon. It was resurrected using dark magic. It is skilled at transforming broken data into evil computer viruses. Its powers are only half as strong during the daytime.

records.name: Demon
records.profile: One of the Seven Great Demon Lords. It was a high-ranking Angel Digimon, but it was exiled to the darkness after it rebelled against the good world. Now it is planning revenge against the Digital World.

records.name: Lilithmon
records.profile: A Digimon that was originally a high-ranking Angel Digimon. It fell to the dark side and is now called ’The Goddess of Darkness’. It is one of the Seven Great Demon Lords. Anything touched by the nails of its left hand will corrode.

records.name: Piemon
records.profile: A Digimon shrouded in mystery. No one knows how or why it was born. It possesses a strong and elusive power, so if you meet it you’ll have no choice but to resign yourself to your final moments.

records.name: Patamon
records.profile: A Digimon that can fly in the sky due to its big ears. However, its speed is only 1 km/h, so it is faster if it walks. It doesn’t wear a Holy Ring, but the genes of ancient Digimon are hidden inside it.

records.name: Tailmon
records.profile: A Holy Digimon wearing a Holy Ring on its tail. It looks very sweet and innocent, but it has very sharp nails that are copied from Saberleomon’s data.

records.name: Angemon
records.profile: A Digimon whose job is maintaining Good in the Digital World and keeping out Evil. It has six divine wings that are said to bring happiness.

records.name: Angewomon
records.profile: A Digimon who has a calm personality but is very strict with twisted and evil individuals. It will punish them until they change. Thanks to its morals and power, it is praised as ’The Goddess’ of the Digital World.

records.name: Holyangemon
records.profile: A Digimon responsible for surveilling the world as an agent of light. Whenever darkness approaches, it changes to battle mode. It fights the darkness with its sacred sword Excalibur in its right hand and its Beam Shield in its left hand.

records.name: Goddramon
records.profile: A Holy dragon Digimon with a shining, golden body. It is one of the Four Great Dragons. It is small and wears in its right hand Umon the Blue Thunder, a weapon of regeneration, and in its left hand Amon the Red Flame, a weapon of destruction.

records.name: Holydramon
records.profile: A Digimon seated on the highest cliff of the god beast Digimon. It is the master of the skies and has the power to invade anything. It is one of the Four Great Dragons. Legends predict its advent when the evil forces become too strong.

records.name: Hououmon
records.profile: The head of the bird Digimon. It has four shiny golden wings. It wears two Holy Rings and is said to govern all the Holy Bird Digimon. Its power is immeasurable.

records.name: Elecmon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from Tsunomon. It is very curious and likes pranks. Its nine tails open during battle like the feathers of a peacock and intimidate the enemy.

records.name: Gaomon
records.profile: A Digimon with sharp claws, agile moves, and strong legs. It is a subspecies of Gazimon. It has a number of deadly skills that involve movement. Depending on its partner, it can also be a cool, intellectual character.

records.name: V-mon
records.profile: A Digimon that can use digimentals and perform armor evolution, it is the survivor of a family that flourished during the Genesis of the Digital World. Although it is mischievous, it has a strong sense of justice and cares about its partners.

records.name: Geogreymon
records.profile: A subspecies of Greymon. Its whole body developed like a lethal weapon, becoming even more aggressive. It has the same lethal skill as Greymon.

records.name: Blackgaogamon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved to the Black form. During its evolution process a mysterious secretion called ’Black Digitron’ was mixed in. It is not as light as Gaogamon, but it has a sturdier body.

records.name: Blackgarurumon
records.profile: A type of virus Garurumon. Sharp blades grow from its shoulders, which it can use to cut anything it touches. It collects bones and buries them in the ground, but sometimes Drimogemon steals them from it.

records.name: Pegasmon
records.profile: A Digimon covered in golden armor. It armor-evolved from Patamon with the Digimental of Hope. It flies freely in the sky and holds absolute power, using its holy power against evil.

records.name: Lighdramon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from V-mon using the Digimental of Friendship. It possesses the attribute of thunder and attacks its enemies with a lightning-quick electric shock.

records.name: Blackmachgaogamon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved to the Black form. During its evolution process a mysterious secretion called ’Black Digitron’ was mixed in. It is not as fast as Machgaogamon, but it can fly for longer periods.

records.name: Blackweregarurumon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from the virus Garurumon. Its speed decreased but the attack power of both its arms increased, improving its ability. It became even more bloodthirsty and puts more pressure on its enemy.

records.name: Rizegreymon
records.profile: A Digimon with over half of its body mechanized. It also learned how to fly. It flies freely in the sky with its huge body and attacks using the Chrome Digizoid revolver in its left hand.

records.name: Shinegreymon
records.profile: A Light Dragon Digimon that stores the burning energy of the Sun and uses it in battle. No matter how many times it falls, it always gets back up due to its strong spirit. It can summon the Geogrey Sword, in which the power of the earth is concentrated.

records.name: Kotemon
records.profile: A Swordsman Digimon that wears its armor at all times, so its body is a true mystery. It is working hard to become a top-class swordsman. It is a coward and cries very easily, but it is a good friend and has a strong sense of justice.

records.name: Gargomon
records.profile: A hunter Digimon. It is agile and can jump very high. It wears a gatling gun on each of its arms. Its favorite jeans are the specially ordered D-Vi’S503XX.

records.name: Rapidmon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from Terriermon using the Digimental of Fate, turning its body golden. Its abilities are as strong as those of the ultimate level.

records.name: Seraphimon
records.profile: The highest of the Angel Digimon. It has ten golden wings on its back. It is the unifier of all Angel Digimon and the enforcer of divine law. It is said that it will descend for the final battle against evil.

records.name: Blackmetalgarurumon
records.profile: A virus type of Metal Garurumon. All its armament works at low temperatures. It has an unforgiving personality, hunting its prey with everything it has.

records.name: Aquilamon
records.profile: A Giant Bird Digimon called The Great Eagle of the Desert. It is always faithful to its master. It flies the sky at Mach speed, locates its prey using its sharp eyes, and charges its enemy using the horns on its head.

records.name: Ankylomon
records.profile: A Digimon whose whole body is covered in a hardened epidermis. It uses its stiff spine in both defense and attack. It has a brave personality and attacks its enemies with great force.

records.name: Lilamon
records.profile: A Digimon that has the appearance of a lilac, a flower loved by everyone. A beautiful Digimon, it governs over death and rebirth. It has a pure and innocent personality, but its leaves contain a lethal poison.

records.name: Kingetemon
records.profile: An Etemon Digimon that calls itself The King of Kings. Acting like an ultimate clown, it always has a sneer on its face and is dressed in a Monkey Costume with the ’Great King’ characters written on its chest.

records.name: Goburimon
records.profile: A Digimon that loves evil and uses its cunning attacks in a group. It is as intelligent as it is cunning, but it is very cowardly. If it is left to fight alone and realizes it is at a disadvantage, it runs away like a rabbit.

records.name: Devidramon
records.profile: An Evil Beast Digimon called from the Dark Area by Devimon. It was born from a hacker who misused the network. It freezes its enemies by staring at them with its four glowing red eyes.

records.name: Chimairamon
records.profile: A Digimon created by combining the biological parts of various other Digimon. It is driven by its battle instincts and is very strong in combat, but nobody knows how it was born or other details about its life.

records.name: Neodevimon
records.profile: A Digimon artificially strengthened by somebody unknown. It is incredibly strong but completely controlled by its mask, which suppresses even its own will.

records.name: Venomvamdemon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from Vamdemon with all its power unleashed. It has lost most of its intelligence and is only driven by the desire for destruction. Even Vamdemon itself hates becoming this ugly Digimon.

records.name: Cherubimon (evil)
records.profile: Although one of The Three Great Angels, it transformed into an evil form for some mysterious reason. It is incredibly powerful and capable of destroying the equilibrium in the Digital World. It passes divine judgement on all living things.

records.name: Blackseraphimon
records.profile: A hybrid Digimon that stole its data from Seraphimon and Mercuremon. It has ten bat wings and wields power directed toward evil. It also has Mercuremon’s tricks.

records.name: Belialvamdemon
records.profile: A Digimon that lurks in the darkness of the human heart. It is the final form of Vamdemon. Unlike Venomvamdemon, it kept its intelligence. On its arms it has the parasitic living guns Sodom and Gomorrah.

records.name: Millenniumon
records.profile: An ultimate form synthetic Digimon born through the combination of the mechanized Mugendramon and the synthetic Chimairamon. It has the power to control time, and it is said it cannot be knocked down.

records.name: Terriermon
records.profile: A Digimon whose evolution is shrouded in mystery. It is rumored that it is sometimes born with a twin. It has a very cute appearance, but as a combat Digimon there is immense power hidden inside it.

records.name: Nefertimon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from Tailmon using the Digimental of Light. It has the attribute of light and can gracefully fly in the sky. It can purify the corruption of the darkness using the power of intense light.

records.name: Ofanimon
records.profile: A Digimon that spreads love and mercy. It is the ultimate form of the female Angel Digimon. It protects the Kernel (the God’s land) together with Seraphimon and Cherubimon.

records.name: Agumon
records.profile: A Digimon with a red waistband wrapped around its arms. It is unlike the normal Agumon. It does not distinguish between regular attacks and special moves, and it is believed that its evolution path is different.

records.name: Renamon
records.profile: A Digimon of high intelligence. It can become even more intelligent through the influence of its partners or its childhood education. Its enemies are at its mercy in battles that favor speed over force.

records.name: Kyubimon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from a very skilled and experienced Renamon. It is a bewitching fox. Although it is not very strong, it has a strong spirit and a variety of skills.

records.name: Fladramon
records.profile: A Digimon who has armor-evolved from V-mon through the Digimental of Courage. Its combat skills are similar to a burning flame, and it hits its enemies with extremely strong knuckles.

records.name: Grappuleomon
records.profile: A martial arts Digimon who has been enlightened to some original secrets. It received its fighting data from the veteran warrior Leomon. Its digicore moves the four turbines that stand for its limbs.

records.name: Taomon
records.profile: A Digimon with a strong mind and great knowledge of Onmyodo. It can use all the skills of this art. It has many charms and dark weapons in its sleeves. It is adept at attacking its enemies from the dark.

records.name: Ulforcevdramon
records.profile: A Digimon that can freely manipulate the holy Ulforce and has the power to reconstruct digital data. It is the sacred knight predicted in the legends. It wears armor made of Blue Digizoid and has godly speed.

records.name: Sakuyamon
records.profile: A Digimon fulfilling the role of a miko, the agent of God’s will. It has four kuda-kitsune around its waist-belt. The sound of its servants and the echo of its singing voice have the power to exorcise all evil.

records.name: Bancholeomon
records.profile: A Digimon who wins while respecting its sense of justice and holding to its beliefs. It would face even the Three Great Angels or the Royal Knights to make its sense of justice understood.

records.name: Toyagumon
records.profile: A Digimon whose whole body is made of plastic blocks. It was built using Agumon as a model. However, it is very cowardly and has no courage. When it is surprised, its body breaks into pieces.

records.name: Magnamon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved through the Digimental of Miracles. Dressed in Chrome Digizoid armor, its power is comparable to that of an ultimate form. In times of crisis, it can escape using the power of miracles.

records.name: Mechanorimon
records.profile: A Powered Suit Digimon. It is run by a small Digimon inside it. A Digimon still under development, its digicore can cause overheating depending on the operating conditions.

records.name: Giromon
records.profile: A Digimon patrolling the computer network. It fights off illegal intruders. Called the Net Keeper, it attacks any invading enemy with all its forces.

records.name: Megadramon
records.profile: A Virus Dark Dragon Digimon. It was upgraded to be able to destroy a network by itself. It invades the computer network, destroys the host computers, and modifies them easily.

records.name: Craniummon
records.profile: The most respectful Digimon of the Royal Knights. It pays respect even to its enemies during combat. It holds the legendary magic spear Claiomh Solais and the sturdy shield Avalon.

records.name: Justimon
records.profile: A hero of justice Digimon trailing a red muffler. It can change its arm by replacing the plug of its Extend Transmitter.

records.name: Saintgargomon
records.profile: A huge machine Digimon equipped with high-temperature weapons on its whole body. These weapons are comparable to those carried by Metalgarurumon. It is slow but can easily repel its enemies with the power of fire.

records.name: Kamemon
records.profile: A Digimon equipped with a shell in the shape of a mouse and trackball on its belly. When it retreats into its shell, its defense increases significantly, but its helmet cannot fit inside.

records.name: Sunflowmon
records.profile: A Digimon that looks like a sunflower. It absorbs energy when it bathes in the sunlight. It loves basking in the sun and, on days with good weather, it flies using the leaves on its back.

records.name: Tortamon
records.profile: A Digimon with dense armor and sharp blades. It makes a soft noise when it walks. Its moving speed is extremely slow. However, it can retract its limbs and rotate, making its speed more than 10 times greater.

records.name: Reppamon
records.profile: A kamaitachi-style Digimon. Its tail is a sharp blade with a will of its own. It likes to battle in the forest. It attacks together with its blade, but there are times when they don’t get along very well.

records.name: Etemon
records.profile: A Digimon calling itself the King of Digimon. It wears a fortified monkey suit and sings its best numbers. It gets along well with Monzaemon, but it is rumored it pulls the other’s strings in the shadows.

records.name: Sagomon
records.profile: A Digimon with a cheerful and easy-going personality. It transforms into a dreadful Digimon if even one of the skulls at its waist disappears. It was expelled from heaven and has set out on a journey in search of its true identity.

records.name: Leviamon
records.profile: One of the Seven Great Demon Lords sleeping in the abyss of the Digital World. It has a huge body and is called the Devil Beast due to its very large jaw.

records.name: Phascomon
records.profile: A Digimon living in the Evil Forest spreading in the Dark Area. It is a dangerous Digimon, even though it doesn’t look like one. It sleeps in trees all the time and sometimes attacks negligent opponents by jumping on them.

records.name: Porcupamon
records.profile: An endangered species of Digimon. It didn’t live in the Dark Area originally but was driven away by other species. Its body is covered with a special razor material.

records.name: Astamon
records.profile: A young noble Digimon from the Dark Area which binds together the devil-type Digimon. It has the power to surpass the ultimate form, and it attacks its enemies without mercy. Its favorite machine gun is Oro Salmon.

records.name: Skullsatamon
records.profile: A ruined but refined Fallen Angel Digimon. Its main purposes are power and destruction. Dark power is condensed in its dark digicore.

records.name: Marindevimon
records.profile: A subspecies of Digimon. It is full of hatred because it lives alone in the deep sea. Its two tentacles have their own will and are free to attack on their own.

records.name: Armagemon
records.profile: A super ultimate form Digimon, formed by scattering Kuramon everywhere and then putting all the pieces together in the real world. It took over Diablomon’s plans and seeks revenge against Omegamon.

records.name: Barbamon
records.profile: A Digimon living in the center of the Dark Area. It is one of Seven Great Demon Lords, the supervisors of the fallen angels. Obsessed with all the treasures in the network, it can employ any methods when it comes to materialistic issues.

records.name: Belphemon: Ragemode
records.profile: A Digimon awakened after a long sleep. It is the incarnation of anger. Its ferocious roar is enough to disintegrate the data of weaker Digimon. It considers everything that comes into its sight to be an enemy.

records.name: Metaletemon
records.profile: The ’King of Digimon’ studied its weak points after each battle and coated its whole body in Chrome Digizoid. Thus, a strong and dirty warrior was born!

records.name: Lilithmon
records.profile: The mysterious and beautiful goddess of darkness. It deceives its opponents and always brings death to those who fall into temptation. It is generous with evil and unforgiving with good.

records.name: Kudamon
records.profile: A Holy Beast Digimon with a holy shell. It always calmly analyzes the situation and leads the battle to a position favorable for it. It deposits sacred power into its earring daily, and the deposited amount can influence its evolution.

records.name: Sanzomon
records.profile: A monk Digimon who continues its journey of trials in order to find enlightenment. It holds no weapon but only sings its sutras and leads the hearts gone astray. Some Digimon aim for the pure energy stored in its digicore.

records.name: Tyilinmon
records.profile: A Digimon who, though it has been in its Perfect form since the genesis of the Digital World, is said to hold the same power as an Ultimate form. It has a very merciful personality, but it severely punishes those who kill unjustly.

records.name: Shakamon
records.profile: A Digimon originally very close to Yggdrasil. It has been protecting the eastern region for a long time and is full of affection. It sometimes gives trials to the Digital World and waits for Digimon to surmount them.

records.name: V-dramon
records.profile: An ancient species of Digimon that only exists on the Folder Continent of the Digital World. When its emotions go wild, its strength grows such that it can even overpower Perfect-form Digimon, though this has detrimental effects on its long-term health.

records.name: Aerovdramon
records.profile: A legendary Digimon. It evolved after many battles from V-dramon, a rare species. It now has stronger fighting skills due to its flying ability, its hard skin, and its sharp claws and horns.

records.name: Cyberdramon
records.profile: A mysterious Digimon covered in special rubber armor. It is the partner of the legendary tamers. It doesn’t belong to the Virus Busters, but it hunts viruses on its own.

records.name: Zhuqiaomon
records.profile: A legendary Digimon protecting the southern region of the Digital World. One of the Four Holy Beasts, it has a wild temper and is hostile towards human interference to the Digital World.

records.name: Yaksamon
records.profile: A Demon Man Digimon with a fierce fighting force. It uses its secret arts in its battles. It wields its two wooden swords freely, giving it a god-like power. It has a very calm personality and places much importance in faithfulness.

records.name: Wolfmon
records.profile: A Digimon who evolved through the Human Spirit of Light, inheriting the power of the Ten Warriors of Light. It embodies the spirit of chivalry, and its body is covered in holy amethyst that gives it power if used with the right intentions.

records.name: Garummon
records.profile: A Digimon who evolved through the Beast Spirit of Light, inheriting the power of the Ten Warriors of Light. It uses its high speed to surprise its enemies with its attacks and its sharp claws and fangs to rip them apart.

records.name: Locomon
records.profile: A Digimon whose purpose in life is to continue running and advancing on the rails. It isn’t very fast, but, because it runs continuously, it can sometimes distort time and space.

records.name: Grandlocomon
records.profile: A Digimon obtained through the limit breakthrough of Locomon. It created its own rails and now runs carelessly through the network. It runs with outstanding speed and breaks everything it collides with into pieces.

records.name: Baihumon
records.profile: One of the Four Holy Beasts. It protects the western region of the Digital World. It boasts the greatest power of the Four Holy Beasts. It is said that it has god-like power, but it is basically a neutral figure.

records.name: Beowolfmon
records.profile: A Digimon who inherited power from the Ten Warriors of Light. It acquired unknown abilities, combining the powers of both man and beast. It has Trinitat in its right hand and Roland 2 in its left hand. It is very good at distance attacks.

records.name: Lordknightmon
records.profile: A member of the Royal Knights that governs over all Knight Digimon. It sticks to its own sense of justice, but if it must maintain peace, it can also use force to eliminate the weak.

records.name: Floramon
records.profile: A Digimon who evolved like a reptile but is classified as a plant. Its petals protect its head like a helmet. Its rival is Palmon.

records.name: Woodmon
records.profile: A Digimon with the shape of a huge withered tree. It pretends to be a simple tree, seizes passing Digimon, and absorbs their energy. It has a ferocious character but is vulnerable to fire.

records.name: Lilimon
records.profile: A Digimon that looks like a human but hides immeasurable power. It is impossible to control once it starts crying. It opens its heart only to humans with the same temperament as its own.

records.name: Xuanwumon
records.profile: One of the Four Holy Beasts. It protects the northern region of the Digital World. It is the oldest of the Four Holy Beasts and has a very warm character. It performs its water skills masterfully.

records.name: Neovamdemon
records.profile: The general of the Moonlight troops. It commands undead Digimon who hide in fields before slaughtering their enemies. Since it lurks in the darkness all the time, it has forgotten what it is like to have feelings and devotes all its time to missions.

records.name: Huanglongmon
records.profile: The emperor of the center of the world. It supervises the Four Holy Beasts, the protectors of the Digital World. Its body is covered in scales made of Huanglong Ore, the basis for Chrome Digizoid. These scales protect it from any wound.

records.name: Qinglongmon
records.profile: One of the Four Holy Beasts. It protects the eastern region of the Digital World. It has been deified and is considered a legendary figure. However, in times of crisis, it always helps the Digital World.

records.name: Chrysalimon
records.profile: An adult Digimon with the appearance of a chrysalis. The child Digimon Keramon temporarily becomes a chrysalis and conserves its energy in order to evolve into a stronger Digimon.

records.name: Angewomon
records.profile: A Digimon with a calm personality, but very strict with twisted and evil characters. She will punish them until they will change. Thanks to her morals and power, she is praised as ’The Goddes’ of the Digital World.

records.name: Keramon
records.profile: A child Digimon that thinks that destroying data is just a game. He destroys the computers he penetrates, eating away data at a rate of 100MB per second.

records.name: Patamon
records.profile: A Digimon that can fly in the sky due to his big ears. However, his speed is only 1 km/h, so it is faster if he walks. He doesn’t wear a Holy Ring, but inside him lie hidden genes of ancient Digimon.

records.name: Bancholeomon
records.profile: A Digimon who continued to win respecting his spirit of justice and without having to break his beliefs. He would face even the Three Great Angels or the Royal Knights if this would help him make his spirit of justice understood.

records.name: Devimon & Ladydevimon
records.profile: Two Fallen Angel Digimon dressed in black. They have sly and atrocious personalities but superior intelligence!

records.name: Angemon & Angewomon
records.profile: These Digimon have gentle personalities but are very composed when it comes to punishing evil. They attack the enemy until they destroy it!

records.name: Devimon & Lady Devimon
records.profile: Anniversary limited scenario! Two Fallen Angel Digimon dressed in black, with a sly and atrocious personality, but superior intelligence!

records.name: Angemon & Angewomon
records.profile: Thank you for preregistering! These Digimon have gentle personalities, but are very composed when it comes to punishing evil. They attack the enemy until they destroy him!

records.name: Lunamon
records.profile: A Digimon born through the fusion of lunar observation data. Its big ears make it look like a rabbit. It is timid and gets attached easily. It can also wield abilities connected to the power of darkness.

records.name: Lekismon
records.profile: A Beast Man Digimon with amazing, powerful jumps. It has its enemies at its mercy with its fast moves. It has a very elusive personality, making its appearance somewhat mysterious.

records.name: Crescemon
records.profile: A Demon Man Digimon. It fights its enemies with its flexible body and supple moves. It always fights in an elegant way, and it is said that its power increases considerably under the moonlight.

records.name: Dianamon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It presides over water and ice and can act even when the surrounding temperature is absolute zero. Like the moon, it is two-faced and hides a terrible power under its beauty.

records.name: Dorumon
records.profile: A beast Digimon with an old-style interface on its forehead. It is speculated it is an experimental ’prototype Digimon’ from before the Digimon were discovered.

records.name: Dorugamon
records.profile: A ferocious Beast Dragon Digimon. It has the attributes of both beasts and dragons. Many Digimon start running away as soon as they see its shadow.

records.name: Doruguremon
records.profile: A Beast Dragon Digimon of huge size. Its nickname is ’the Final Enemy’. Its form was released through the interface on its forehead by the life-data of the legendary creature ’the Dragon’.

records.name: Alphamon
records.profile: One of the Royal Knights. It is also called ’the Aloof Hermit’. It wears a blue fluttering cloak, and its place is called ’the Empty Seat’.

records.name: Vajramon
records.profile: A Digimon who seeks to find the truth about the physical and spiritual worlds. It is under the command of Xuanwumon, one of the Four Holy Beasts.

records.name: Gaioumon
records.profile: A Dragon Man Digimon. It is a subspecies of the Greymon species. It is excellent as a combat species, and its becomes more powerful whenever it wins a battle.

records.name: Zanbamon
records.profile: A Digimon who likes to fight directly with the enemy. It is a general who always stands in the vanguard of its army.

records.name: Guilmon
records.profile: A fighter Digimon comparable to a carnivorous beast. It hides in itself the inherent potential of Digimon. It can become a protective presence in the Digital World if its power is correctly exercised.

records.name: Growmon
records.profile: A wild and ferocious Digimon. It is called ’the Deep Crimson Demon Dragon’. Its roar has the power to shake the ones who hear it, and its mouth spits burning flames. Depending on the tamer’s level of training, it can also fight in the name of justice.

records.name: Megalogrowmon
records.profile: A huge Cyborg Digimon whose upper body is covered in Chrome Digizoid. It can also fly using the verniers on its shoulders, making it immensely powerful in both terrestrial and aerial combat.

records.name: Dukemon
records.profile: A Digimon born from Megidramon. Its name is also linked to the Royal Knights. Its weapons, Gram and Aegis, form from its armor, which is made completely of Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Gomamon
records.profile: A naughty Digimon that likes pranks. Its body is covered with fur so that it can resist cold temperatures. Its claws help it break hard blocks of ice. When it gets angry, the red hair on its head bristles.

records.name: Ikkakumon
records.profile: A Digimon with a horn made of Mithril. The skin under its fur is as hard as its horn. Its claws emit a high temperature which melts the ice under its feet, secures it on firm ground, and allows it to act even in extremely cold places.

records.name: Zudomon
records.profile: A materialistic Digimon that protects its honed body with leather and armor stolen from its enemies. It also possesses the Thor Hammer, a Chrome Digizoid weapon dug out of ancient ice, which produces violent shock waves when used.

records.name: Plesiomon
records.profile: A Digimon that rarely shows itself. It appears to be surrounded by mist, disturbing the viewer’s vision. With its white body and refined appearance, it is a very mysterious figure.

records.name: Vikemon
records.profile: A Beast Man Digimon in the ultimate form. It governs permafrost, the land of extreme cold. Its fur has crystallized, and it’s said to now be as hard as Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Coronamon
records.profile: A Digimon born from sun-watching data. It has a strong sense of justice and is an innocent, naive character. It is good at direct fire attacks, and it can also release flame bombs.

records.name: Firamon
records.profile: A Beast Digimon with the nickname of ’the Lion soaring in the sky’. It is a careful leader, protecting a certain relic of the Digital World.

records.name: Flaremon
records.profile: A majestic Beast Man Digimon. Its mane and presence make it look scary at first glance. However, it has great strength of will and fights through any difficulty for the sake of its friends.

records.name: Apollomon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It has in its body a fiery energy with the power to purify all that exists. Its boiling blood and its pride give it the strength to control this fierce energy.

records.name: Omegamon
records.profile: A Holy Knight Digimon born through the fusion of miracles by the will of the good ones. Well-rounded in combat, it effortlessly wields weapons that themselves have the strength of two Digimon.

records.name: Imperialdramon FM
records.profile: A Digimon who unleashed its full power in dragon mode and transformed into a legendary dragon warrior. It is incredibly intelligent and capable of controlling its violent power.

records.name: Paildramon
records.profile: A Digimon who jogress-evolved from XV-mon and Stingmon. Although it has the skilled attacks of dragons and the defensive ability of insects, the dragon attributes are a little stronger. It is very loyal and always protects its master.

records.name: Ceresmon
records.profile: A Digimon with a peaceful appearance. It can control plant Digimon and absorb the enemy’s energy using its terrifying skill, Famis.

records.name: Rapidmon Armor
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from Terriermon using the Digimental of Fate, turning its body golden. Its abilities are as strong as those of the ultimate level.

records.name: Magnagarurumon
records.profile: A transcendent-species Digimon and user of light-based abilities. It is said its power surpasses that of the legendary Ten Warriors. A master of high-speed travel, when it’s equipped with its flight unit, it can fly at close to the speed of light.

records.name: Lotusmon
records.profile: A Fairy Digimon that looks like a lotus, the flower said to be blooming in heaven. A lady with a calm and gracious personality, it has the power to make one forget one’s sorrows and have happy dreams.

records.name: Leomon
records.profile: A Digimon praised as a noble hero. It is a warrior with a just heart who has defeated many atrocious Digimon. Its rival is Orgemon. On its waist, it carries a magical sword called ’Shishiou-maru’.

records.name: Imperialdramon DM
records.profile: An ancient and incredibly powerful dragon Digimon. Besides its dragon form, it also has another form that can employ its full power. However, because this force is so big, it is difficult to control.

records.name: Beelzebumon
records.profile: An aloof Digimon with a powerful spirit. It has two double-barreled shotguns, the Berenjena. It is feared as one of the Seven Great Demon Lords and looks for battles with strong Digimon.

records.name: Metalgreymon Virus
records.profile: A Digimon who dark-evolved when Agumon was manipulated by the Evil Spiral. It is now a virus type and follows the orders of the Digimon Kaiser, attacking its partners.

records.name: Blackmetalgarurumon
records.profile: A virus type of Metal Garurumon. All its armament works at low temperatures. It has an unforgiving personality, hunting its prey with everything it has.

records.name: Blackwargreymon
records.profile: A Dragon Warrior Digimon that earnestly pursues its own brand of justice. While its ’Brave Shield’ is missing its crest of Courage, it maintains the pride of a warrior, seeking always to understand why it has a soul.

records.name: Omegamon Zwart
records.profile: A Digimon born temporarily as a black Holy Knight by mixing in the recently discovered substance Black Digitron during the fusion process with Omegamon. It sports enhanced powers, not the least of which are the weapons on both its arms.

records.name: Dracomon
records.profile: An old pure-blooded Dragon Digimon. It is said it is the ancestor of all Dramon-type Digimon.

records.name: Coredramon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from Dracomon. It now lives in the steep mountains. For this reason, it has developed wings with which it can fly at high speeds.

records.name: Wingdramon
records.profile: A Sky Dragon Digimon that can fly freely using the big wings it has developed. The scales on its wings can block gravity, which is why it can fly without flapping its wings.

records.name: Slayerdramon
records.profile: A Dragon Man Digimon with its body covered in Chrome Digizoid scale armor.

records.name: Betamon
records.profile: An Amphibian Digimon walking on four legs. It has a warm and quiet personality. However, once it gets angry it releases 1.000.000 V of electric current to attack its enemy.

records.name: Seadramon
records.profile: An Aquatic Digimon with a long body, like a big snake. It uses this long body and coils tightly around its enemy until it stops breathing.

records.name: Waruseadramon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved on an evil path from Seadramon. It is very similar to Megaseadramon and their skills are very much alike as well.

records.name: Alraumon
records.profile: A Plant Digimon similar to Palmon. It lives in warm areas, opening the flowers on top of its head and on its arms and performing photosynthesis.

records.name: Kiwimon
records.profile: An ancient mythical Digimon said to have been extinct due to too much hunting following the spread of the internet. It is a Bird-type Digimon but cannot fly due to the complete degeneration of its wings.

records.name: Sirenmon
records.profile: A God Man Digimon that looks like a combination of fish and man. It has a cheerful personality and always sings a joyful song.

records.name: Darkdramon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon that is supposed to be the weapon of last resort for the mechanized ’D-brigade’.

records.name: Qinglongmon
records.profile: One of the Four Holy Beasts. It protects the eastern region of the Digital World. It has been deified and is considered a legendary figure. However, in times of crisis, it always helps the Digital World.

records.name: Turuiemon
records.profile: A Digimon blessed with a rare talent for Chinese martial arts but still in training. It uses its originally developed technique to fight its enemies.

records.name: Cherubimon (good)
records.profile: An Angel Digimon in the shape of a beast. It is one of the Three Great Angels and sits in the highest position together with the Seraph Digimon Seraphimon.

records.name: Valkyrimon
records.profile: A Digimon covered in shiny armor. Its armor produces an aurora which regenerates the data of heroes fallen in battle and returns them to a new Digitama.

records.name: Dianamon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It presides over water and ice and can act even when the surrounding temperature is absolute zero. Like the moon, it is two-faced and hides a terrible power under its beauty.

records.name: Alphamon
records.profile: One of the Royal Knights. It is also called ’the Aloof Hermit’. It wears a blue fluttering cloak, and its place is called ’the Empty Seat’.

records.name: Dukemon
records.profile: A Digimon born from Megidramon. Its name is also linked to the Royal Knights. Its weapons, Gram and Aegis, form from its armor, which is made completely of Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Apollomon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It has in its body a fiery energy with the power to purify all that exists. Its boiling blood and its pride give it the strength to control this fierce energy.

records.name: Omegamon
records.profile: A Holy Knight Digimon born through the fusion of miracles by the will of the good ones. Well-rounded in combat, it effortlessly wields weapons that themselves have the strength of two Digimon.

records.name: Vikemon
records.profile: A Beast Man Digimon in the ultimate form. It governs permafrost, the land of extreme cold. Its fur has crystallized, and it’s said to now be as hard as Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Ulforcevdramon
records.profile: A Digimon that can freely manipulate the holy Ulforce and has the power to reconstruct digital data. It is the sacred knight predicted in the legends. It wears armor made of Blue Digizoid and has godly speed.

records.name: Goddramon
records.profile: A Holy dragon Digimon with a shining, golden body. It is one of the Four Great Dragons. It is small and wears in its right hand Umon the Blue Thunder, a weapon of regeneration, and in its left hand Amon the Red Flame, a weapon of destruction.

records.name: Leviamon
records.profile: One of the Seven Great Demon Lords sleeping in the abyss of the Digital World. It has a huge body and is called the Devil Beast due to its very large jaw.

records.name: Ceresmon
records.profile: A Digimon who forgot the gratitude owed to the forest and land. It now brings fear to the forests, harming trees and spoiling the land.

records.name: Grandlocomon
records.profile: A Digimon obtained through the limit breakthrough of Locomon. It created its own rails and now runs carelessly through the network. It runs with outstanding speed and breaks everything it collides with into pieces.

records.name: Sleipmon
records.profile: A member of the Royal Knights that dresses in Red Digizoid armor, which is known for its hardness. It moves with a superior, instantaneous speed, shooting light arrows with the sacred crossbow Muspelheim.

records.name: Grankuwagamon
records.profile: A dreadful Digimon called the devil of the deep forest. It is the final form of the Kuwagamon species. It lives in the depths of the forests and is fully nocturnal. Its eternal rival is Heraklekabuterimon.

records.name: Huanglongmon
records.profile: The emperor of the center of the world. It supervises the Four Holy Beasts, the protectors of the Digital World. Its body is covered in scales made of Huanglong Ore, the basis for Chrome Digizoid. These scales protect it from any wound.

records.name: Highandromon
records.profile: An ultimate Cyborg Digimon who has reached the perfect form of the incomplete Andromon.

records.name: Dukemon
records.profile: A Digimon born from Megidramon. Its name is also linked to the Royal Knights. Its weapons, Gram and Aegis, form from its armor, which is made completely of Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Ofanimon
records.profile: A Digimon that spreads love and mercy. It is the ultimate form of the female Angel Digimon. It protects the Kernel (the God’s land) together with Seraphimon and Cherubimon.

records.name: Lopmon
records.profile: A very rare Digimon. It is born as the twin of Terriermon and has three horns. Although it is a Combat-species like Terriermon, it is a crybaby and feels lonely very easily.

records.name: Andiramon
records.profile: A Grappling Digimon. It can easily control its mind and harden its body, having kaleidoscopic attack and defense skills. When it receives damage from the enemy, it can instantly recover using the power of its mind.

records.name: Hawkmon
records.profile: A calm and polite Digimon that protects its partners with the dedication of a knight. The descendant of an ancient race, it can armor-evolve using Digimentals.

records.name: Silphymon
records.profile: A Digimon who jogress-evolved from Aquilamon and Tailmon. Its developed legs allow it to jump and glide easily. It captures its enemies with the radar on both its ears.

records.name: Shoutmon x3GM
records.profile: An Incandescent Dragon Digimon. It burns everything with its flame wings. Its strong point is aerial combat at super speed.

records.name: Shoutmon x4B
records.profile: A God Horse Digimon, formed from a Victory-form base Digimon to which Beelzebumon was added. Beelzebumon’s power is added to all attacks, producing strong sword and gun skills.

records.name: Shoutmon x7
records.profile: A Digimon formed through the Alder-burst of Shoutmon DX and the DigiXros of Ballistamon, Dorulumon, Sparrowmon, and Starmons. The burning hearts of the seven Digimon will lead to world peace.

records.name: Bagramon
records.profile: An Angel Digimon who originally governed over Death. It became disappointed with the world’s philosophy and started a revolt, for which it was punished. It now continues searching for a new philosophy to substitute the gods’ philosophy.

records.name: Blastmon
records.profile: A Mineral Digimon with a super hard and heavy body. Its strength lies in attacks that use its body. Even if its crystal armor breaks, it can regenerate. It loves eating gems.

records.name: Tactimon
records.profile: A soldier carrying an evil sword called Jatetsufujin-maru. Its ingenuity is essential in planning its battles, and it wouldn’t draw back from sacrificing allies for victory.

records.name: Dianamon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It presides over water and ice and can act even when the surrounding temperature is absolute zero. Like the moon, it is two-faced and hides a terrible power under its beauty.

records.name: Dukemon
records.profile: A Digimon born from Megidramon. Its name is also linked to the Royal Knights. Its weapons, Gram and Aegis, form from its armor, which is made completely of Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Apollomon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It has in its body a fiery energy with the power to purify all that exists. Its boiling blood and its pride give it the strength to control this fierce energy.

records.name: Ulforcevdramon
records.profile: A Digimon that can freely manipulate the holy Ulforce and has the power to reconstruct digital data. It is the sacred knight predicted in the legends. It wears armor made of Blue Digizoid and has godly speed.

records.name: Gazimon
records.profile: A Digimon with a nasty personality. It sometimes uses its claws to attack its enemies, but mostly just to dig pitfalls and trap them.

records.name: Dobermon
records.profile: A ferocious Hunter Digimon. It was born through the transformation of a Virus into a Vaccine Digimon. It always follows its instincts and hunts Virus Digimon.

records.name: Cerberumon
records.profile: A Demon Beast Digimon called ’the Watchdog of Hell’. The claws on its four limbs are hard enough to be able to tear through a low-grade Chrome Digizoid alloy.

records.name: Gaogamon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from Gaomon, whose claws grew out of its gloves. It uses its cool behavior and strong legs to quickly approach the enemy, then attacks it with its sharp claws.

records.name: Machgaogamon
records.profile: A Digimon equipped with a rocket engine on its back that possesses a huge driving force. It can fly at maximum thrust for a short time. Its special tactics are head-on and hit-and-run.

records.name: Shakamon
records.profile: A Digimon originally very close to Yggdrasil. It has been protecting the eastern region for a long time and is full of affection. It sometimes gives trials to the Digital World and waits for Digimon to surmount them.

records.name: Omegamon
records.profile: A Holy Knight Digimon born through the fusion of miracles by the will of the good ones. Well-rounded in combat, it effortlessly wields weapons that themselves have the strength of two Digimon.

records.name: Demon
records.profile: A Digimon looking to evolve to the super ultimate form using Arkadimon. Its ambitions are controlling the Digital World and invading the real world. All its acts stem from a desire for vengeance against the existence of all that is good.

records.name: Seraphimon
records.profile: The highest of the Angel Digimon. It has ten golden wings on its back. It is the unifier of all Angel Digimon and the enforcer of divine law. It is said that it will descend for the final battle against evil.

records.name: Ofanimon
records.profile: A Digimon that spreads love and mercy. It is the ultimate form of the female Angel Digimon. It protects the Kernel (the God’s land) together with Seraphimon and Cherubimon.

records.name: Craniummon
records.profile: The most respectful Digimon of the Royal Knights. It pays respect even to its enemies during combat. It holds the legendary magic spear Claiomh Solais and the sturdy shield Avalon.

records.name: Zhuqiaomon
records.profile: A legendary Digimon protecting the southern region of the Digital World. One of the Four Holy Beasts, it has a wild temper and is hostile towards human interference to the Digital World.

records.name: Baihumon
records.profile: One of the Four Holy Beasts. It protects the western region of the Digital World. It boasts the greatest power of the Four Holy Beasts. It is said that it has god-like power, but it is basically a neutral figure.

records.name: Xuanwumon
records.profile: One of the Four Holy Beasts. It protects the northern region of the Digital World. It is the oldest of the Four Holy Beasts and has a very warm character. It performs its water skills masterfully.

records.name: Qinglongmon
records.profile: One of the Four Holy Beasts. It protects the eastern region of the Digital World. It has been deified and is considered a legendary figure. However, in times of crisis, it always helps the Digital World.

records.name: Imperialdramon FM
records.profile: A Digimon who unleashed its full power in dragon mode and transformed into a legendary dragon warrior. It is incredibly intelligent and capable of controlling its violent power.

records.name: Imperialdramon PM
records.profile: A Digimon, originally Imperialdramon: Fightermode, who received the power of Omegamon. On its Omega Blade is engraved ’Reset’ in Digimon letters, as it resets all the data of the enemy Digimon it cuts.

records.name: Seraphimon
records.profile: The highest of the Angel Digimon. It has ten golden wings on its back. It is the unifier of all Angel Digimon and the enforcer of divine law. It is said that it will descend for the final battle against evil.

records.name: Ofanimon
records.profile: A Digimon that spreads love and mercy. It is the ultimate form of the female Angel Digimon. It protects the Kernel (the God’s land) together with Seraphimon and Cherubimon.

records.name: Qinglongmon
records.profile: One of the Four Holy Beasts. It protects the eastern region of the Digital World. It has been deified and is considered a legendary figure. However, in times of crisis, it always helps the Digital World.

records.name: Slayerdramon
records.profile: A Dragon Man Digimon with its body covered in Chrome Digizoid scale armor.

records.name: Jupitermon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It governs the sky and weather. On the battlefield it distinguishes skillfully between good and evil and applies divine punishment to the evil ones.

records.name: Evilmon
records.profile: A Small Devil Digimon. It is tough and hates to lose. It doesn’t fight directly but instead teases its weak enemies in a mean and dirty way.

records.name: Mephismon
records.profile: A Digimon born from the residual thoughts of Apoclymon. It seeks revenge against Omegamon and wants to destroy any form of life. It has a developed intellect and careful tactics.

records.name: Jupitermon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It governs the sky and weather. On the battlefield it distinguishes skillfully between good and evil and applies divine punishment to the evil ones.

records.name: Jupitermon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It governs the sky and weather. On the battlefield it distinguishes skillfully between good and evil and applies divine punishment to the evil ones.

records.name: Cherubimon (good)
records.profile: An Angel Digimon in the shape of a beast. It is one of the Three Great Angels and sits in the highest position together with the Seraph Digimon Seraphimon.

records.name: Wargreymon
records.profile: A Digimon equipped with Dramon Killers on both its arms and the Brave Shield on its back. It is a veteran hero wearing armor made of Chrome Digizoid. It has a humanoid shape and is remarkably powerful and fast.

records.name: Venomvamdemon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from Vamdemon with all its power unleashed. It has lost most of its intelligence and is only driven by the desire for destruction. Even Vamdemon itself hates becoming this ugly Digimon.

records.name: Baihumon
records.profile: One of the Four Holy Beasts. It protects the western region of the Digital World. It boasts the greatest power of the Four Holy Beasts. It is said that it has god-like power, but it is basically a neutral figure.

records.name: Kingetemon
records.profile: An Etemon Digimon that calls itself The King of Kings. Acting like an ultimate clown, it always has a sneer on its face and is dressed in a Monkey Costume with the ’Great King’ characters written on its chest.

records.name: Monzaemon
records.profile: A Digimon covered in mystery. It looks like a simple teddy bear, but there are several rumors as to who hides under the zipper on its back.

records.name: Rosemon
records.profile: A beautiful female Digimon called the queen of flowers. On its breast it wears a Tiferet, a jewel in which is engraved the symbol of love and beauty. This jewel promises eternal beauty.

records.name: Magnakidmon
records.profile: A Digimon who loves single combat. When it comes to important fights, it shoots bullets indescriminately and becomes very trigger happy.

records.name: Avengekidmon
records.profile: A Digimon born from a Digimon that was defeated by Magnakidmon. Overtaken by a ruthless desire for revenge, its digicore was overloaded by negative mind data, resulting in a sudden transformation.

records.name: Aegiomon
records.profile: This Digimon loves peace and doesn’t especially care for combat. However, it conceals many latent hidden powers, and when it fights to protect someone, its actual combat abilities are exceptional.

records.name: Wargreymon
records.profile: A Digimon equipped with Dramon Killers on both its arms and the Brave Shield on its back. It is a veteran hero wearing armor made of Chrome Digizoid. It has a humanoid shape and is remarkably powerful and fast.

records.name: Metalgarurumon
records.profile: A Digimon whose whole body is mechanized. It is the final form of Garurumon. It retains Garurumon’s speed despite the many heavy firearms attached to its body. It finds its enemies with the laser on the tip of its nose and swiftly shoots them down.

records.name: Metalgreymon
records.profile: A Digimon with over half of its body mechanized. It is said to have the power of a nuclear warhead. Only a Greymon who has won numerous battles can evolve to this stage.

records.name: Weregarurumon
records.profile: A commando-type Digimon that has the leg strength of Garurumon and skilled war tactics. Its jumping abilities are top tier. It has a strong sense of duty and serves its master and partners faithfully.

records.name: Atlurkabuterimon
records.profile: A Digimon discovered in the net area of the tropics. It is an evolved form of Kabuterimon. Its body is about 1.5 times that of Kabuterimon. It’s fighting skills have improved thanks to the muscles it developed, but its flying skills dropped.

records.name: Belialvamdemon
records.profile: A Digimon that lurks in the darkness of the human heart. It is the final form of Vamdemon. Unlike Venomvamdemon, it kept its intelligence. On its arms it has the parasitic living guns Sodom and Gomorrah.

records.name: Mummymon
records.profile: A Digimon also known as ’the Necromancer’ because it summons and manipulates the residual data of Digimon who have died before their time. It treats the bandages that wrap its body like individual creatures. It fights using its favorite gun, Obelisk.

records.name: Archnemon
records.profile: A queen Digimon that has the appearance of the spider queen from Greek legends. It governs over all Dokugumon. It is very intelligent and uses cunning tricks when attacking its prey. It can also take human shape.

records.name: Wendimon
records.profile: A Digimon who dark-evolved from a Lopmon consumed by hatred and anger. Deep down it has a kind heart, but it is hidden under a destructive impulse. It can manipulate time and space in its need to destroy.

records.name: Holydramon
records.profile: A Digimon seated on the highest cliff of the god beast Digimon. It is the master of the skies and has the power to invade anything. It is one of the Four Great Dragons. Legends predict its advent when the evil forces become too strong.

records.name: Seraphimon
records.profile: The highest of the Angel Digimon. It has ten golden wings on its back. It is the unifier of all Angel Digimon and the enforcer of divine law. It is said that it will descend for the final battle against evil.

records.name: Dinobeemon
records.profile: A Digimon who jogress-evolved from Stingmon and XV-mon. Its insect attributes are more pronounced now. It discovers its enemies with its compound eye and finishes them off with violent techniques.

records.name: Shakkoumon
records.profile: A Digimon who jogress-evolved from Ankylomon and Angemon. It is believed that it might be an ancient Angel Digimon. Its neck and torso can rotate 360 degrees and allow it to attack in all directions.

records.name: Silphymon
records.profile: A Digimon who jogress-evolved from Aquilamon and Tailmon. Its developed legs allow it to jump and glide easily. It captures its enemies with the radar on both its ears.

records.name: Minotaurmon
records.profile: A Digimon who doesn’t move very fast. It has very tough skin and barely feels anything from normal attacks. Its lethal skill is Darkside Quake, where it produces a great earthquake with its left ’Demon Arm’.

records.name: Skullbaluchimon
records.profile: A huge Undead Digimon. It was reproduced by adding data from fake fossils to the fossil data of what is thought to have been the largest terrestrial mammal.

records.name: Titamon
records.profile: A Digimon with the nickname ’One-Man Division’. Its strong body is possessed by limitless hatred. It runs through the battlefield in search of the Olympos XII, whom it wants dead.

records.name: Digitamamon
records.profile: A Digimon shaped like a Digitama, the beginning and end of all Digimon. It is covered in mystery, not participating in the processes of evolution or growth. Its shell repels all attacks.

records.name: Fugamon
records.profile: A subspecies of Orgemon. It has a red body and wears shorts with a tiger pattern. Its lethal skill is ’Evil Hurricane’.

records.name: Saberleomon
records.profile: An ancient Digimon that is said to be the ancestor of Leomon. It is a huge beast with overwhelmingly destructive claws, strong penetrative tusks, and legs that allow it to run at Mach speed.

records.name: Dinotigermon
records.profile: An Ancient Beast Digimon. It was born through the partial evolution of Saberleomon, whose body was fortified with metal.

records.name: Lilimon
records.profile: A Digimon that looks like a human but hides immeasurable power. It is impossible to control once it starts crying. It opens its heart only to humans with the same temperament as its own.

records.name: Dinorexmon
records.profile: A Carnivorous Dinosaur Digimon nicknamed ’the King of Terror’. Its strength stands completely apart from that of other Dinosaur Digimon. It fights with unparalleled ferocity.

records.name: Jyureimon
records.profile: A Digimon that is extremely intelligent and powerful. It is the higher evolution of Woodmon.

records.name: Imperialdramon PM
records.profile: A Digimon, originally Imperialdramon: Fightermode, who received the power of Omegamon. On its Omega Blade is engraved ’Reset’ in Digimon letters, as it resets all the data of the enemy Digimon it cuts.

records.name: Zekegreymon
records.profile: A Digimon who received the power to evolve from the legendary Digimon. It is now a Greymon who seeks perfect victory and the ability to fight any kind of enemy. Its body, covered in Gold Digizoid, has high defense and is very light.

records.name: Victorygreymon
records.profile: A subspecies of Wargreymon. This Digimon is a heroic dragon warrior carrying the crushing sword ’Dramon Breaker’. It developed its own fencing style that hits and smashes its enemies rather than cutting them.

records.name: Metalgreymon
records.profile: A reinforced battle form of Digimon, born through the DigiXros of Greymon and Mailbirdramon. With Greymon’s power and Mailbirdramon’s armor, it now has the strength to annihilate many enemies.

records.name: Omegashoutmon
records.profile: A Digimon born when the released burning soul of Shoutmon received the legendary ’Evolution’ from Omegamon. It is covered in Omega Force so godly bright that it movements are perceived only as an afterimage of light.

records.name: Miragegaogamon
records.profile: A Digimon with its whole body covered in Chrome Digizoid armor. It moves at such incredible speed that it tricks its enemies into believing it is just a mirage. It can also cut it enemies instantly using Gale Claws.

records.name: Jewelbeemon
records.profile: An Insect Digimon with a shiny iridescence like a jewel beetle. Its hard armor changes color depending on the angle from which you view it, like a prism. This also has the effect of dazzling the eyes of its enemies.

records.name: Tyrantkabuterimon
records.profile: The ’King of Bugs’. It is the leader of all Insect Digimon. Its den is the ’Under Forest’, deep underneath the dark forest. It is said it is only active at night.

records.name: Flymon
records.profile: An Insect Digimon with huge, evil wings which allow it to fly around at very high speeds. When it flies, it emits a howling noise that deafens the ones who hear it.

records.name: Yammamon
records.profile: An Insect Digimon possessing the data of the enormous Oniyamma. It is carnivorous, so it has a rather savage personality.

records.name: Hououmon
records.profile: The head of the bird Digimon. It has four shiny golden wings. It wears two Holy Rings and is said to govern all the Holy Bird Digimon. Its power is immeasurable.

records.name: Garudamon
records.profile: A Digimon that loves justice and nature. It is the guardian god of earth and wind. Only bird Digimon with high intelligence and fighting ability can evolve into Garudamon. It is a close friend of Leomon, who shares its vision.

records.name: Metalmamemon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon with the nickname ’Smiley Bomber’. It evolved from Mamemon and became even stronger.

records.name: Chaosdramon
records.profile: A Digimon born from a successful experiment where Mugendramon, a combination of parts from numerous Cyborg Digimon, uses its abilities beyond the limits.

records.name: Metaltyranomon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon who modified its body in order to become stronger. Just as Megadramon has superior aerial combat skills, Metaltyranomon has superior terrestrial combat skills.

records.name: Stingmon
records.profile: A very rare Insect Digimon that has the appearance of a human. It also has a hard exterior frame and the very swift moves of an insect.

records.name: Shakkoumon
records.profile: A Digimon who jogress-evolved from Armagemon and Angemon. It is believed that he might be an ancient Angel Digimon. His neck and torso can rotate 360 degrees and allow him to attack in all directions.

records.name: Highandromon
records.profile: An ultimate Cyborg Digimon who has reached the perfect form of the incomplete Andromon.

records.name: Wargreymon
records.profile: A Digimon equipped with Dramon Killers on both its arms and the Brave Shield on its back. It is a veteran hero wearing armor made of Chrome Digizoid. It has a humanoid shape and is remarkably powerful and fast.

records.name: Aegiomon
records.profile: This Digimon loves peace and doesn’t especially care for combat. However, it conceals many latent hidden powers, and when it fights to protect someone, its actual combat abilities are exceptional.

records.name: Agumon & Wargreymon
records.profile: The cheerful Agumon, who fears nothing and fights with its strong claws, joins forces with the veteran hero Wargreymon, dressed in its Chrome Digizoid armor.

records.name: Fragment of Courage
records.profile: Fragment used to evolve to Wargreymon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of Courage
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Wargreymon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Crystal of Courage
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve to a particular Wargreymon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Fragment of Friendship
records.profile: Fragment used to evolve to Metalgarurumon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of Friendship
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Metalgarurumon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Crystal of Friendship
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve to a particular Metalgarurumon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Fragment of the Darkness King
records.profile: Fragment used to evolve to Belialvamdemon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of the Darkness King
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Belialvamdemon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Crystal of the Darkness King
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve to a particular Belialvamdemon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Aegiochusmon
records.profile: A Digimon based on Dragon-type data stored in its body, concentrated in the crystal in its chest. In this form, the data manifests on the surface of its body as armor.

records.name: Titamon
records.profile: A Digimon with the nickname ’One-Man Division’. Its strong body is possessed by limitless hatred. It runs through the battlefield in search of the Olympos XII, whom it wants dead.

records.name: Fragment of Soul
records.profile: Fragment used to evolve to Titamon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of Soul
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Titamon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Soul of the Demon
records.profile: Soul used to evolve to a particular Titamon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: The Giant’s Helmet
records.profile: Helmet used to evolve to Titamon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: The Giant’s Armour
records.profile: Armor used to evolve to Titamon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: The Giant’s Sword
records.profile: Sword used to evolve to Titamon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Dragon’s Knowledge
records.profile: The heart of the wild fierce dragon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: EXP Floppy Gold
records.profile: Use it in Digifuse as a Material Digimon to get more XP for your Base Digimon.

records.name: EXP Floppy Silver
records.profile: Use it in Digifuse as a Material Digimon to get more XP for your Base Digimon.

records.name: EXP Floppy Bronze
records.profile: Use it in Digifuse as a Material Digimon to get more XP for your Base Digimon.

records.name: Bit Ingot Gold
records.profile: Sell it for 30000 Bits.

records.name: Zekegreymon
