records.profile: A Digimon who received the power to evolve from the legendary Digimon. It is now a Greymon who seeks perfect victory and the ability to fight any kind of enemy. Its body, covered in Gold Digizoid, has high defense and is very light.

records.name: Victorygreymon
records.profile: A subspecies of Wargreymon. This Digimon is a heroic dragon warrior carrying the crushing sword ’Dramon Breaker’. It developed its own fencing style that hits and smashes its enemies rather than cutting them.

records.name: Weregarurumon
records.profile: A commando-type Digimon that has the leg strength of Garurumon and skilled war tactics. Its jumping abilities are top tier. It has a strong sense of duty and serves its master and partners faithfully.

records.name: Garurumon
records.profile: A Digimon covered with fur as hard as mithril. It is feared by other Digimon because it hunts its prey with a carnivore’s speed and very precise attacks.

records.name: Victorygreymon
records.profile: A subspecies of Wargreymon, a heroic dragon warrior carrying the crushing sword ’Dramon Breaker’. He developed his own fencing style and, rather than cutting his enemies, he hits and smashes them.

records.name: Metalgreymon virus species
records.profile: A Digimon who dark-evolved when Agumon was manipulated by the Evil Spiral. It is now a virus type and follows the orders of the Digimon Kaiser, attacking its partners.

records.name: Blackwargreymon
records.profile: A Dragon Warrior Digimon that earnestly pursues its own brand of justice. While its ’Brave Shield’ is missing its crest of Courage, it maintains the pride of a warrior, seeking always to understand why it has a soul.

records.name: Marinangemon
records.profile: A Fairy Digimon living in the Internet sea. It rarely shows itself to others. An Angemon in name only, it is a completely different species in terms of ecosystem.

records.name: Kaiserleomon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved through the beast spirit. It carries the power of the Ten Warriors of Darkness. Released from the curse of Cherubimon, it is covered in Obsidian Digizoid and is called ’the Jet-black Lion’.

records.name: Darkknightmon
records.profile: A Digimon combined through the vows of two blood-brothers. It is a first-level warrior that mixes their ingenuity and ability to take action. It uses any method to achieve its purpose.

records.name: Lynxmon
records.profile: A Beast Digimon in the shape of a lynx. It is covered in burning fur and inhabits the tropical jungles. It has a free spirit and is the exact opposite of Garurumon, who lives in cold areas.

records.name: Gokumon
records.profile: A fugitive Digimon born from the data on a list of wanted criminals.

records.name: Nanomon
records.profile: A Digimon originally used as a Vaccine for restoring the data of crashed computers. Its thought circuits were destroyed when it was attacked by a powerful Virus Digimon. It is now uncontrollable.

records.name: Tuwarmon
records.profile: A Ninja Digimon released from the Punpun Armor, which was restraining the abilities of Damemon. It deceives its enemies with its foolish appearance and chops them up using Mantis Arm.

records.name: Drimogemon
records.profile: A Digimon who can move swiftly underground using the huge drill on its nose. It is very rarely seen, as it spends most of its time deep underground.

records.name: Chimairamon
records.profile: A Digimon created by combining the biological parts of various other Digimon. It is driven by its battle instincts and is very strong in combat, but nobody knows how it was born or other details about its life.

records.name: Mugendramon
records.profile: A completely metal Digimon that was created by combining the parts of many cyborg Digimon. An evil program is written in its digicore and supplies it with infinite malice.

records.name: Mugendramon
records.profile: A completely metal Digimon that was created by combining the parts of many cyborg Digimon. An evil program is written in its digicore and supplies it with infinite malice.

records.name: Millenniumon
records.profile: An ultimate form synthetic Digimon born through the combination of the mechanized Mugendramon and the synthetic Chimairamon. It has the power to control time, and it is said it cannot be knocked down.

records.name: Grankuwagamon
records.profile: A dreadful Digimon called the devil of the deep forest. It is the final form of the Kuwagamon species. It lives in the depths of the forests and is fully nocturnal. Its eternal rival is Heraklekabuterimon.

records.name: Cyberdramon
records.profile: A mysterious Digimon covered in special rubber armor. It is the partner of the legendary tamers. It doesn’t belong to the Virus Busters, but it hunts viruses on its own.

records.name: Airdramon
records.profile: An intelligent Digimon that flies freely in the sky. They say that its existence is close to the gods, especially when it calls up storms with its cry. Its fierce personality makes it difficult for ordinary tamers to use.

records.name: Kuwagamon
records.profile: A Digimon of the same maturity as Kabuterimon, its eternal rival. It has well-developed battle instincts. It attacks its prey immediately and grasps it in its scissors.

records.name: Oukuwamon
records.profile: An aggressive Digimon evolved from Kuwagamon. Its scissors have grown even stronger, and its scouting skills have improved due to an enhanced sense of touch. Its defensive abilities, which were not very developed in Kuwagamon, improved as well.

records.name: Karatenmon
records.profile: A Demon Man Digimon with the appearance of a Shugenja and the face of a crow. It is a follower of the Daitengu Digimon.

records.name: Breakdramon
records.profile: A Digimon with abilities and powers that surpass those of other Machine Digimon. It has the ability to hack certain pieces of heavy construction equipment while they are evolving, capturing them.

records.name: Bigmamemon
records.profile: A boss variant of Mamemon. It has the nickname of ’Smiley Bomber’. It is also believed it might be an aggregate of Mamemon.

records.name: Snimon
records.profile: A Digimon made from the data of a mantis. It hunts down its target like a very precise machine.

records.name: Pukumon
records.profile: A British Punk Digimon, it was born from the mutation of a computer virus created by the greatest hacker in all of Britain.

records.name: Metalpiranimon
records.profile: A Digimon with a metal head, very sharp teeth, and very strong jaw. It can cut any armor into pieces.

records.name: Grain of Synthetic Beast
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Chimairamon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of Machine Dragon
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Mugendramon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of Dimensions
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Millenniumon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Valdurmon
records.profile: A rare Holy Bird Digimon living in the stratosphere at 40,000m above ground. It has 6 giant wings, the largest of which reach 30m when fully spread.

records.name: Yatagaramon
records.profile: A Digimon leading the chosen ones to the Golden Land in the eastern part of the Digital World. During this trip, it gives them a three-part trial, and only those who complete it can reach the Golden Land.

records.name: Peckmon
records.profile: A Bird Digimon with the ability to fly. It is actually faster when it runs with its strongly developed legs. Due to its high jumps and fast rotations, it can use its body like a shuriken to attack its enemies.

records.name: Aquilamon
records.profile: A Giant Bird Digimon called The Great Eagle of the Desert. It is always faithful to its master. It flies the sky at Mach speed, locates its prey using its sharp eyes, and charges its enemy using the horns on its head.

records.name: Birdramon
records.profile: A Digimon dressed in a blazing flame and born of a firewall. It flies freely within the network. Its specialty is air attacks.

records.name: Ornismon
records.profile: An Ancient Bird Digimon said to be extinct since ancient times. Called ’the Ruler of the Skies’, it attacks much larger Digimon from above.

records.name: Cockatrimon
records.profile: A Giant Bird Digimon who lived for so long on the ground that it became unable to fly. It attacks very ferociously using its developed body and legs as weapons, but it possesses very low energy efficiency.

records.name: Saberdramon
records.profile: A savage Digimon resembling Birdramon. It is covered in dark flames and attacks ferociously. It is said that its sharp claws are the origin of its name.

records.name: Diatrymon
records.profile: An Ancient Bird Digimon with very strong legs. It is called ’the Living Fossil’.

records.name: Akatorimon
records.profile: A Giant Bird Digimon living in the savanna. It is related to Cockatrimon. Just like Cockatrimon, it cannot fly.

records.name: Deramon
records.profile: A strange Digimon that looks like a Bird Digimon at first glance. It actually has a lush green plant growing on its back. It has plant attributes and cannot fly, similar to Kiwimon.

records.name: Parrotmon
records.profile: A strange bird that came from another Digital World through a crack in time and space. It has very strong foot claws and wears two Holy Rings on its arms.

records.name: Hippogriffomon
records.profile: A Mythical Beast Digimon in the shape of a synthetic beast. It is said it evolves into Griffomon, but further details are unknown.

records.name: Kokabuterimon
records.profile: An Insect Digimon that is small but very strong. It has a large horn and front legs. Although it is greatly feared, it doesn’t really like conflicts and has a mild personality.

records.name: Ceresmon
records.profile: A Digimon who forgot the gratitude owed to the forest and land. It now brings fear to the forests, harming trees and spoiling the land.

records.name: Ceresmon Medium
records.profile: A Digimon who forgot the gratitude owed to the forest and land. It now brings fear to the forests, harming trees and spoiling the land.

records.name: Vegimon
records.profile: An Insectivore Plant Digimon with long ivy and a mouth that can open very wide.

records.name: Blossomon
records.profile: A Plant Digimon in its Perfect form. It has the appearance of an enormous flower. Numerous tentacles grow from its body. Despite the grotesqueness of its appearance, its has a quiet personality and rarely shows itself in front of others.

records.name: Grain of the Fertility God
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Ceresmon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Crystal of the Fertility God
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve to a particular Ceresmon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Yorishiro’s Grain
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Ceresmon Medium. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Yorishiro’s Crystal
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve to a particular Ceresmon Medium. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Matadrmon
records.profile: A Digimon said to be born from the folk music database of a certain museum. It has mastered the unique steps for ’Bulldog’, a dance it arranged itself.

records.name: Metalfantomon
records.profile: A Digimon that receives its energy from a Digital World in another dimension. It is said this Digimon is manipulated by an unknown entity.

records.name: Pharaohmon
records.profile: A Digimon said to evolve from Mummy Digimon. It had absolute power and dominated many areas in the ancient Digital World.

records.name: Matadrmon
records.profile: A bloodsucking martial artist Digimon that performs a magnificent dance. It has mastered the unique steps for ’Bulldog’, a dance it arranged itself.

records.name: Metalfantomon
records.profile: A Digimon that receives its energy from a Digital World in another dimension. It is said this Digimon is manipulated by an unknown entity.

records.name: Pharaohmon
records.profile: A Digimon said to evolve from Mummy Digimon. It had absolute power and dominated many areas in the ancient Digital World.

records.name: Sakuyamon (Miko)
records.profile: The appearance of Sakuyamon when it performs religious rituals and asks the gods for divine guidance. It doesn’t fight very much in this form, but it has a stronger ability to remove evil spirits.

records.name: Kuzuhamon
records.profile: A God Man Digimon said to have lived a long time as a fox Digimon. It has changed over time and now has a human appearance.

records.name: Slashangemon
records.profile: A Power Digimon that commands the Angel corps ’Powers’ and leads all battles. When it comes to defending justice, it doesn’t fear even death.

records.name: Karatenmon
records.profile: A follower of Daitengu Digimon. It excels in shugendo. In its hands it holds the two swords ’Irataka no Ken’, in which magical powers are concentrated. It can read its opponent’s spirit and anticipate its moves.

records.name: Wisemon
records.profile: A Digimon using the ’Book’ as its spiritual dwelling. It can use it to change its appearance and show up anywhere in time and space. This is why it’s said its real body might actually exist in a different dimension.

records.name: Gulfmon
records.profile: A Demon Beast emerged from the abyss of the Dark Area. Embedded in the lower half of its body is a mouth able to swallow everything. It is said that the swallowed Digimon have their digicore crushed and fall to the Dark Area.

records.name: Mephismon
records.profile: A Digimon born from the residual thoughts of Apoclymon. It seeks revenge against Omegamon and wants to destroy any form of life. It has a developed intellect and careful tactics.

records.name: Youkomon
records.profile: A Bewitching Beast Digimon in the shape of a giant blue fox with nine tails. Unlike Kyubimon, it is feared as a Bewitching Beast that brings ruin and destruction.

records.name: Asuramon
records.profile: A Digimon from the ancient Indian civilization. It has four arms and three faces: anger, mercy, and blessing. It values justice, and its wrath strikes those that commit injustices. This is why it is also called the incarnation of the god of light.

records.name: Kyubimon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from a very skilled and experienced Renamon. It is a bewitching fox. Although it is not very strong, it has a strong spirit and a variety of skills.

records.name: Doumon
records.profile: An onmyoji Digimon mastering the Onmyodo. It fights making full use of a variety of techniques. It is particularly strong in using magic, especially spells and talismans.

records.name: Siesamon
records.profile: A Digimon in the shape of a Shisa, the holy beast of Okinawa. It gathers its energy from the sun and protects its tamer from any disaster, exerting great power against the forces of evil.

records.name: Picklemon
records.profile: A Fairy Digimon mastering magic. It can recite a sophisticated programming language from another dimension to produce miracles similar to magic.

records.name: Dracumon
records.profile: A mischievous Digimon from the Dark Area. It spends all its energy playing pranks, even on the Four Holy Beasts. It is aiming for the Royal Knights as its next targets.

records.name: Soulmon
records.profile: A Digimon exactly like Bakemon, who incorporates magic data from fantasies, except its magic is enhanced by a black hat.

records.name: Sangloupmon
records.profile: A sublime blood-sucking wolf Digimon. It is a rather old species of Digimon, surviving from the Genesis era of the Digital World.

records.name: Granddracumon
records.profile: A Demon Beast Digimon, considered the king of vampire Digimon. It built a castle in the Dark Area that has been there since the old times. It is said that it is so strong that not even the Seven Great Demon Lords dare to meddle with it.

records.name: Skullmammon
records.profile: An Undead Digimon whose whole body was eaten by viruses and is now reduced to only a skeleton.

records.name: Kaisergreymon
records.profile: A transcendent species of Digimon that possesses fire powers and is said to surpass the power of even the legendary Ten Warriors.

records.name: Wolfmon
records.profile: A Digimon who evolved through the Human Spirit of Light, inheriting the power of the Ten Warriors of Light. It embodies the spirit of chivalry, and its body is covered in holy amethyst that gives it power if used with the right intentions.

records.name: Ancientvolcamon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors said to have saved the ancient Digital World. It has the Earth attribute. Its power is matchless because it uses a volcano as its source. It specializes in attacks based on explosions.

records.name: Musyamon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from a game’s samurai data infected with a virus. Its ghastly appearance is the proof of its survival in endless battle. It seeks a final battle with the brave Leomon.

records.name: Panjyamon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from a part of Leomon. Leomon, who trains every day so it can defend justice, acquired the power of cold in the snowy arctic areas of the Digital World.

records.name: Raptordramon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon based on a wild predator Digimon so that it is certain to kill its target.

records.name: Death-X-Dorugamon
records.profile: An Undead Digimon born through an experiment that sought a higher evolution. It is said that, at the time of the experiment, it strikingly resembled the Adult form of the original ’Prototype Digimon’ of the ’Doru Series’.

records.name: Death-X-Doruguremon
records.profile: An Undead Digimon born through an experiment that sought a higher evolution. It is said that, at the time of the experiment, it strikingly resembled the Ultimate form of the original ’Prototype Digimon’ of the ’Doru Series’.

records.name: Ginryumon
records.profile: A Dragon Beast Digimon with its whole body covered in a robust Japanese style armor. Despite its appearance, it has a very light body and drifts gracefully through the air. It fights and parries its enemies’ attacks with its hard and slippery armor.

records.name: Hisyaryumon
records.profile: A Digimon usually as calm and intelligent as a god. However, when the crystal-like sphere it’s holding is damaged, its godly wrath is awakened and it attacks with all of its body and soul.

records.name: Omekamon
records.profile: A Puppet Digimon born from a computer’s data of design drawings. It itself doesn’t know who and what it is and, for now, acts like the ’Royal Knights’, the most famous Holy Knights Digimon.

records.name: Whamon
records.profile: A giant Digimon living in the depths of the Net Sea. It is rarely encountered since it has a quiet personality and lives in obscurity. It is sometimes seen in the waters near File Island.

records.name: Tankdramon
records.profile: A Machine Digimon and member of the mechanized ’D-brigade’, whose missions are riot, assault, and destruction. It is specialized in destroying multiple targets and boasts overwhelming firepower.

records.name: Assaultmon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon armed with various heavy weapons. Its combat power is increased by its Protect Suit. It is a member of Centalmon’s Special Forces.

records.name: Cannondramon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon equipped with a long-range cannon. It wears very hard armor and eliminates approaching enemies with one blow of its tail.

records.name: Tankdramon
records.profile: A Machine Digimon and member of the mechanized ’D-brigade’, whose missions are riot, assault, and destruction. It is specialized in destroying multiple targets and boasts overwhelming firepower.

records.name: Assaultmon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon armed with various heavy weapons. Its combat power is increased by its Protect Suit. It is a member of Centalmon’s Special Forces.

records.name: Cannondramon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon equipped with a long-range cannon. It wears very hard armor and eliminates approaching enemies with one blow of its tail.

records.name: Commandramon
records.profile: An infantry Digimon. Member of the mechanized ’D-brigade’.

records.name: Sealsdramon
records.profile: It is said only 1 Commandramon in 100 can pass the special screening test ’Selection-D’ and evolve to Sealsdramon.

records.name: Tyranomon
records.profile: A Digimon like an ancient dinosaur that existed in the prehistoric world. It sweeps everything down with its huge tail and the two arms it has developed. It is also intelligent and docile, making it easy to get attached to.

records.name: Beelzebumon
records.profile: An aloof Digimon with a powerful spirit. It has two double-barreled shotguns, the Berenjena. It is feared as one of the Seven Great Demon Lords and looks for battles with strong Digimon.

records.name: Alphamon
records.profile: One of the Royal Knights. It is also called ’the Aloof Hermit’. It wears a blue fluttering cloak, and its place is called ’the Empty Seat’.

records.name: Grain of the Bullet Knights
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Tankdramon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Crystal of the Bullet Knights
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve to a particular Tankdramon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of the Iron Horse
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Assaultmon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Crystal of the Iron Horse
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve to a particular Assaultmon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of the Gun Dragon
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to Cannondramon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Crystal of the Gun Dragon
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve to a particular Cannondramon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Gankoomon
records.profile: A Digimon that rarely remains in the same place. It travels around the Digital World with next-generation Huckmon, seeking out and quashing any indications of abnormality or chaos.

records.name: Shutumon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved through the Beast Spirit. It harbors the wind power of the Ten Warriors. It has a capricious and deceiving personality and never takes initiative in battle. It can control the wind using a secret Mesopotamian spell.

records.name: Bancholeomon
records.profile: A Digimon who wins while respecting its sense of justice and holding to its beliefs. It would face even the Three Great Angels or the Royal Knights to make its sense of justice understood.

records.name: Boltmon
records.profile: An experimental Cyborg Digimon who was made at the same time as Andromon. As evident from its appearance, it isn’t a machine like Andromon but is made of flesh and blood.

records.name: Volcamon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon with a large and powerful body. Its name comes from the volcano on its back, which explodes when its anger reaches its peak, or when its tension voltage exceeds maximum capacity.

records.name: Kangarumon
records.profile: A Digimon with incredibly powerful punches, kicks, and jumps. It moves swiftly to the bosom of its enemy and performs an uppercut, then jumps high and kicks hard.

records.name: Volcdramon
records.profile: A Volcano Dragon Digimon that inhabits the magma layer of the active volcanoes sprinkled in the Digital World.

records.name: Valvemon
records.profile: The largest Machine Digimon. Its purpose is to carry many Digimon at once, but Valvemon itself has enough power to drive back its enemies.

records.name: Metallifekuwagamon
records.profile: A Digimon with a human shape and grappling ability. With its hard shell and quick movements, it is one of the most well-balanced Perfect form Digimon.

records.name: Bladekuwagamon
records.profile: An Insect Machine Digimon whose whole body has turned into a dangerous weapon. It is a rare species whose body is made of Chrome Digizoid in Adult form.

records.name: Fairimon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved through the Human Spirit. It harbors the wind power of the Ten Warriors. It freely manipulates the air and can produce vacuums and mirages. It is also good at gathering information.

records.name: Thunderballmon
records.profile: A Digimon related to Mamemon. It stores electricity in its magnetized body. Its nickname is ’Generator Digimon’. It releases an electric shock of 10 million V to attacking enemies.

records.name: Loaderliomon
records.profile: A Machine Digimon born through the fusion of Beast Digimon data and the construction machine CAD data leaked from the server.

records.name: Grappuleomon
records.profile: A martial arts Digimon who has been enlightened to some original secrets. It received its fighting data from the veteran warrior Leomon. Its digicore moves the four turbines that stand for its limbs.

records.name: Marsmon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It is a war hero who has mastered all martial arts, including dirty fighting. It excels at direct fights and mainly prefers to wrestle.

records.name: Liamon
records.profile: A Holy Beast Digimon who already has the air of a king despite only being an Adult form. It is said it evolved from Liollmon. However there are even fewer surviving Liamon than Liollmon, making it an ’illusion’ creature.

records.name: Aegiochusmon Green
records.profile: A Digimon based on Plant-type data stored in its body, concentrated in the crystal in its chest. In this form, the data is particularly entrenched in its upper body and arms.

records.name: Knowledge of Nature
records.profile: The spirit of the gently whispering trees is marked. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Wargreymon
records.profile: A Digimon equipped with Dramon Killers on both its arms and the Brave Shield on its back. It is a veteran hero wearing armor made of Chrome Digizoid. It has a humanoid shape and is remarkably powerful and fast.

records.name: Metalgarurumon
records.profile: A Digimon whose whole body is mechanized. It is the final form of Garurumon. It retains Garurumon’s speed despite the many heavy firearms attached to its body. It finds its enemies with the laser on the tip of its nose and swiftly shoots them down.

records.name: Garudamon
records.profile: A Digimon that loves justice and nature. It is the guardian god of earth and wind. Only bird Digimon with high intelligence and fighting ability can evolve into Garudamon. It is a close friend of Leomon, who shares its vision.

records.name: Lilimon
records.profile: A Digimon emerging from a beautiful blossoming flower. It has a tomboyish and whimsical character, but it is gentle and always lends a hand to the weak. A refreshing wind blows after it flies with its leaf wings.

records.name: Zudomon
records.profile: A materialistic Digimon that protects its honed body with leather and armor stolen from its enemies. It also possesses the Thor Hammer, a Chrome Digizoid weapon dug out of ancient ice, which produces violent shock waves when used.

records.name: Ladydevimon
records.profile: A female fallen angel Digimon that holds dark power of incomparable purity. It is impossible to control it using personal computers. Its enemy is Angewomon.

records.name: Hangyomon
records.profile: A Digimon that fast-travels in the Net waters using its wet suit and the high-speed water motor attached to its back. It pierces enemies entering its territory with its beloved harpoon ’Trent’.

records.name: Pinochimon
records.profile: A Puppet Digimon born from the cursed Jyureimon data. It is like a marionette but can also move by itself. It loves saying all kinds of lies.

records.name: Angewomon
records.profile: A beautiful and gentle Angel Digimon with eight pure white wings. It has the compassionate ability to heal its allies’ wounds, but it can also destroy evil enemies.

records.name: Weregarurumon
records.profile: A commando-type Digimon that has the leg strength of Garurumon and skilled war tactics. Its jumping abilities are top tier. It has a strong sense of duty and serves its master and partners faithfully.

records.name: Venomvamdemon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from Vamdemon with all its power unleashed. It has lost most of its intelligence and is only driven by the desire for destruction. Even Vamdemon itself hates becoming this ugly Digimon.

records.name: Piemon
records.profile: A Digimon shrouded in mystery. No one knows how or why it was born. It possesses a strong and elusive power, so if you meet it you’ll have no choice but to resign yourself to your final moments.

records.name: Apoclymon
records.profile: A Dark Digimon born from negative human feelings, its appearance was foretold in ancient prophecies. It seeks to pull the Digital World into the dark world that spreads out infinitely.

records.name: Venomvamdemon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from Vamdemon with all its power unleashed. It has lost most of its intelligence and is only driven by the desire for destruction. Even Vamdemon itself hates becoming this ugly Digimon.

records.name: Piemon
records.profile: A Digimon shrouded in mystery. No one knows how or why it was born. It possesses a strong and elusive power, so if you meet it you’ll have no choice but to resign yourself to your final moments.

records.name: Apoclymon
records.profile: A Dark Digimon born from negative human feelings, its appearance was foretold in ancient prophecies. It seeks to pull the Digital World into the dark world that spreads out infinitely.

records.name: Black grain
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve to a dark Digimon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Black crystal
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve a particular dark Digimon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Anubimon
records.profile: A Digimon who monitors the Dark Area, the place where Digimon are transferred who died naturally or fell in battle. Fallen Angel Digimon are also transferred there while still alive.

records.name: Clavisangemon
records.profile: An Angel Digimon guarding the ’Zenith Gate’ that separates the Digital World from the outside world.

records.name: Arkadimon (Ultimate)
records.profile: A Digimon who evolved to an Ultimate form by absorbing dark data. It can also achieve the Ultimate evolution through its tamer, and when not controlled by its tamer, it can transform into various other forms.

records.name: Mistymon
records.profile: A Digimon who has mastered many magical skills (advanced programming languages) and is also quite skilled at swordplay.

records.name: Boogiemon
records.profile: An eerie Demon Man Digimon with countless tattoos of incantations on its body. They say each one signifies a spell it can use.

records.name: Darklizamon
records.profile: An Evil Dragon Digimon with its whole body covered in a quietly burning dark flame. It is a virus evolved from Flarelizamon with a cool personality.

records.name: Phelesmon
records.profile: A Fallen Angel Digimon resembling a nobleman. It is said it grants people’s wishes, but in exchange it steals their souls.

records.name: Flarelizamon
records.profile: A Flame Dragon Digimon with its whole body covered in flames. Hot-blooded, it possesses a burning heart and the power of a dragon.

records.name: Clockmon
records.profile: A Digimon that manages all time and space within the computers on the Network. It can freely move back and forth in time, at least within the years 1900-1999.

records.name: Mametyramon
records.profile: A small Mutant Digimon feared as the ’Little Tyrant’. It is comprised of Tyranomon’s data condensed into a tiny body, and despite its appearance, Tyranomon’s ferocity and combat instincts are remarkably recognizable.

records.name: Ex-tyranomon
records.profile: A Puppet Digimon that sneaked its way inside a stuffed animal in the shape of Tyranomon.

records.name: Igamon
records.profile: A mysterious Digimon wearing a red mask. It wanders through the Digital World accumulating knowledge.

records.name: Kougamon
records.profile: A subspecies of Igamon. Unlike red Igamon, Kougamon is colored in purple.

records.name: Cerberumon Werewolfmode
records.profile: A Mutant of Cerberumon, called the ’Hell’s Watchdog’ of the Digital World.

records.name: Fangmon
records.profile: It is said to be the Digimon form of the wicked wolf who appears in all the fairy tales. Once it has selected his prey, it never lets it escape. Sometimes it even masquerades as a friend of its prey in order to get close to them.

records.name: Werewolf’s grain
records.profile: Grain used to evolve Cerberumon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Werewolf’s crystal
records.profile: Crystal used to evolve Cerberumon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Light of God
records.profile: Grain used to evolve Aegiochusmon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Raijinmon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon with the name of ’Raijin’, the thunder god of Eastern mythology. It is very adept at close combat.

records.name: Fujinmon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon with the name of ’Fujin’, the wind god of Eastern mythology. A light fighter who uses airy movements, it is skilled at close combat.

records.name: Suijinmon
records.profile: A Machine Digimon made of parts of Mugendramon and Justimon.

records.name: Rapidmon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon evolved from Gargomon. It moves at close to the speed of light and controls a large ear-type radar. It always captures its prey, even in the darkness.

records.name: Ebidramon
records.profile: A maverick Dramon type of Digimon, it has a lobster’s hard shell and huge scissors. Those inclined to treat it lightly due to his looks are destined to become its prey and fall victim to the Dramon attack power.

records.name: Shellmon
records.profile: A Digimon resembling a hermit crab who dwells in the seas of the Internet. It lives in a shell adapted to the size of his body. As it grows bigger, it exchanges its shell for a larger one, eventually reaching the size of a small hill.

records.name: Mantaraymon
records.profile: A Digimon who appears quick and aggressive but is actually quite the opposite. It swims gracefully in the seas of the Internet and has a gentle personality.

records.name: Rukamon
records.profile: An Aquatic Mammal Digimon, it is the Digimon form of some peculiar signals that occurred during the study of interspecies communication.

records.name: Anomalocarimon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved through the capture of ancient organisms’ data, when a computer virus infected the data bank of the institute responsible for investigating and excavating ancient organisms.

records.name: Scorpiomon
records.profile: An Insect Digimon called the ’Assassin of the Desert’. Concealing its presence, it approaches its opponent from behind and pierces them with the deadly poison needle at the tip of its tail.

records.name: Waspmon
records.profile: A Digimon with highly developed reconnaissance skills using its head antennae. It constantly patrols the perimeter of its base, alert for enemies approaching it and immediately attacking any who get too close.

records.name: Tobucatmon
records.profile: A Puppet Digimon in the shape of a cat flying around the Internet seas.

records.name: Valvemon
records.profile: The largest Machine Digimon. Its purpose is to carry many Digimon at once, but Valvemon itself has enough power to drive back its enemies.

records.name: Eldoradimon
records.profile: A Mutant Digimon born when a Digimon became lost in the ancient ruins of abandoned computers and eventually fused with the research data stored there.

records.name: Raidenmon
records.profile: A heavyweight Machine Digimon equipped with electromagnetic firing weapons.

records.name: Mechanorimon
records.profile: A Powered Suit Digimon. It is run by a small Digimon inside it. A Digimon still under development, its digicore can cause overheating depending on the operating conditions.

records.name: Blimpmon
records.profile: The soft balloon-like section of this Digimon is covered by a metal coating, but apparently it is still under development, as the left half of its body is left bare.

records.name: Solarmon
records.profile: A rare species of Machine Digimon believed to be a mutant form of Hagurumon. The digicore inside of it generates heat, giving its body a very high temperature that burns when touched.

records.name: Chaosdramon
records.profile: A Digimon built to repel any attack and destroy anything it encounters. Its body is made of the imaginary metal ’Red Digizoid’, a Chrome Digizoid repurified and given enhanced firmness.

records.name: Witchmon
records.profile: A Digimon in the shape of a witch who came from Witchelny, a digital world from another dimension. It is always chasing its rival Wizarmon.

records.name: Dogmon
records.profile: A Puppet Digimon born from the database of an American TV cartoon. Its rubberlike body is strong and elastic enough to absorb any attack.

records.name: Starmon
records.profile: A space warrior with a burning fighting spirit. The scars on its muffler are testament to its fierce battle history. Hot-blooded, this Digimon dashes like a meteor onto the battlefield in order to fight for justice.

records.name: Petermon
records.profile: An eternal-boy Digimon who soars freely through the sky. It invites all Digimon who refuse evolution into the children’s world, Never-Everland. It masterfully wields its knife to punish all those who break their promises.

records.name: Redvegimon
records.profile: An enhanced version of Vegimon with its entire body ripened into red. Unlike the immature Vegimon, it has strong attack power and high intelligence.

records.name: Captainhookmon
records.profile: The captain of a pirate ship that sails the Digital World. A skilled survivalist, it has a strong sense of responsibility towards its subordinates, and in turn inspires their devotion. It has the personality of a gentleman and effortlessly pursues success on both sea and land.

records.name: Superstarmon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved when Starmon, the space warrior who adores Leomon, finally became a star. It hides behind sunglasses, but its identity is transparently obvious.

records.name: Darksuperstarmon
records.profile: A Digimon tainted with darkness who was born from the observation data of a black hole. Its past is apparently so weighty that it must shut out all light with its sunglasses and abandon all its hopes and dreams.

records.name: Pumpmon
records.profile: An upbeat Digimon born on Halloween through the variation of a virus. It has a calm personality and avoids initiating hostilities, but its appearance belies its formidable abilities.

records.name: Mermaimon
records.profile: A Digimon in the shape of a legendary mermaid that lives in the icy seas of the Digital World.

records.name: Jyagamon
records.profile: A Mimetic Digimon that uses its potatolike shape to hide from its enemies. It has a timid personality and doesn’t like to fight very much, but when pressed, it in fact sports extremely high combat abilities.

records.name: Lampmon
records.profile: A Digimon possessing strong magical powers that can change its body and appearance in a kaleidoscopic manner. It’s also known to create palaces and enormous gold and silver treasures.

records.name: Tinkermon
records.profile: A Digimon who accompanies Petermon and fights to achieve Petermon’s dream. Its brilliant wings are a barometer of its mood, shining brightly when it is in high spirits. Together with Petermon, it performs ’Petermon Syndrome’.

records.name: Tyumon
records.profile: A close friend of Scumon, it acts as the brains of the duo. The two of them act in concert to spread false wisdom. A natural coward, this Digimon quickly runs away when left by itself.

records.name: Gottsumon
records.profile: A cheerful and naughty Digimon like a living ball of energy. Its body is made of hard ore that changes its properties depending on the location and circumstances of its birth, giving it unlimited possibilities for evolution.

records.name: Tsukaimon
records.profile: A Mammal Digimon with large distinctive ears. While it is considered a subspecies of Patamon, its quarrelsome personality is the exact opposite of Patamon’s. It normally acts as Devimon’s messenger.

records.name: Pumpmon
records.profile: An upbeat Digimon born on Halloween through the variation of a virus. It has a calm personality and avoids initiating hostilities, but its appearance belies its formidable abilities.

records.name: Bit Ingot Bronze
records.profile: Sell it for 5000 Bits.

records.name: Bit Ingot Silver
records.profile: Sell it for 10000 Bits.

records.name: Bit Ingot Platinum
records.profile: Sell it for 100000 Bits.

records.name: Numemon
records.profile: A Digimon with no attack power or intelligence, it prefers dark, dank environments. If raised incorrectly, it’s liable to turn into a Numemon, but they say it actually conceals a hidden secret...

records.name: Karatukinumemon
records.profile: A subspecies of Numemon born when a Numemon entered a shell and became a snail.

records.name: Gold Numemon
records.profile: A subspecies of Numemon with a golden body. It was born when a Numemon discovered Goldine mine and incorporated elements from it.

records.name: Platinum Numemon
records.profile: An extremely rare subspecies of Numemon. It was born when a Numemon was the first in the Digital World to discover Platina Mine, evolving and incorporating elements from the mine.

records.name: Paildramon
records.profile: A Digimon who jogress-evolved from XV-mon and Stingmon. Although it has the skilled attacks of dragons and the defensive ability of insects, the dragon attributes are a little stronger. It is very loyal and always protects its master.

records.name: Tonosamagekomon
records.profile: A Digimon that plays its main theme through the two horns on its shoulders. The tone of its voice, several octaves lower than Gekomon’s, imparts a feeling of Tonosama’s grandeur.

records.name: Seadramon
records.profile: An Aquatic Digimon with a long body, like a big snake. It uses this long body and coils tightly around its enemy until it stops breathing.

records.name: Snimon
records.profile: An experimental Digimon created in the institute to be a virus hunter, using data from a praying mantis. It detects its enemies through the red sensors on its head and hunts them down with machinelike precision.

records.name: Octmon
records.profile: A Digimon discovered in a virus experimentally made by a hacker. A collecting maniac, it stores data and digital treasures in his body. It lives in symbiosis with Fujitsumon, a parasite that appeared in a jar.

records.name: Hanumon
records.profile: A Mythical Digimon reported to have been sighted in Central Asia. Its body covered in golden fur, it stands on something resembling a cloud, moving around the Network and fighting off viruses.

records.name: Gorimon
records.profile: A Power Digimon with strong arms that can break anything and powerful legs that can crush all in its path.

records.name: Coelamon
records.profile: A Digimon discovered in the Network seas. It has an extremely primitive body structure and rudimentary fins for limbs.

records.name: Diablomon
records.profile: A greedy Digimon that swelled to huge proportions by absorbing any and all data in the Network. It aims to take over military computers and destroy the Real World in a nuclear attack.

records.name: Infermon
records.profile: An atrocious Digimon capable of invading any network and destroying its data. Its defense is remarkably improved thanks to the limbs attached to its cocoon body.

records.name: Darcmon
records.profile: A junior Angel Digimon with two pairs of wings, it serves as the vanguard of the Angel Digimon. Fighting always at the front lines, it has been nicknamed the ’Goddess of the Battlefield’.

records.name: Qinglongmon
records.profile: One of the legendary Four Great Dragons, its wields thunder with godlike powers and presence. Unbound by the shackles of black-and-white thinking, it serves as a guide to Digimon faced with tough choices.

records.name: Orochimon
records.profile: An eight-headed Digimon. While its primary head in the center is black, the rest of its heads are camouflage. It was born in the ancient Digital World with the purpose of preserving harmony.

records.name: Megadramon
records.profile: A Virus Dark Dragon Digimon. It was upgraded to be able to destroy a network by itself. It invades the computer network, destroys the host computers, and modifies them easily.

records.name: Blackmegalogrowmon
records.profile: A Digimon that exemplifies the destructive nature of viruses, it is called the Black Destroyer Dragon. Its upper body is covered in Chrome Digizoid. Able to fly, it has outstandingly high attack and defense skills.

records.name: Gargomon
records.profile: Originally a Devil Digimon, it constrained its power with suppression instruments, and is now sometimes used by Angel Digimon as a servant.

records.name: Strikedramon
records.profile: A Digimon that retains some features of Monodramon, like the horn extending to the back of its head. However, it looks like a totally different species, as it has transformed into Commander Mode and wears a Metal Plate.

records.name: Seahomon
records.profile: A Digimon with a small body owing to the fact that it lives in areas of high water pressure. However, when it comes to seas with shallower waters, its body is said to grow even larger than Seadramon’s.

records.name: Megaseadramon
records.profile: A Digimon with an enlarged head, hard armor, and a blade in the shape of a lightning bolt. It also has a high level of intelligence and a very cautious personality, following its enemies until it brings them down.

records.name: Gigaseadramon
records.profile: A Digimon whose lethal attacks include the ’Giga Sea Destroyer’ torpedo launched from the cannon in its mouth and ’Sky Wave’ antiaircraft energy shots sprayed in immense number from the opening in its back.

records.name: Megidramon
records.profile: Although this Digimon is one of the Four Great Dragons, it was initially evil, and its very existence was regarded as a digital hazard. This power has been sealed, but if it were released, it could result in catastrophic damage.

records.name: Goddramon
records.profile: A Holy dragon Digimon with a shining, golden body. It is one of the Four Great Dragons. It is small and wears in its right hand Umon the Blue Thunder, a weapon of regeneration, and in its left hand Amon the Red Flame, a weapon of destruction.

records.name: Holydramon
records.profile: A Digimon seated on the highest cliff of the god beast Digimon. It is the master of the skies and has the power to invade anything. It is one of the Four Great Dragons. Legends predict its advent when the evil forces become too strong.

records.name: Deltamon
records.profile: Originally, it consisted of several separate Digimon. However, when a computer went wild during a powerful electromagnetic storm, a bug occurred that fused them all together.

records.name: Babamon
records.profile: Rumor has it that this Digimon resulted when a curse was cast upon a Rosemon.

records.name: Leviamon
records.profile: One of the Seven Great Demon Lords sleeping in the abyss of the Digital World. It has a huge body and is called the Devil Beast due to its very large jaw.

records.name: Kyukimon
records.profile: A Bewitching Beast Digimon that looks like a kamaitachi. Its whole body is like a sharp blade that indiscriminately cuts everything in its vicinity.

records.name: Dinohumon
records.profile: A Dragon Man Digimon gifted with fighting skills. It lives in unexplored territory and hunts down its enemies with its sword, Akinakes.

records.name: Gesomon
records.profile: A Digimon feared as the ’White Devil of the Deep Seas’. It is very intelligent and does no harm to Digimon outside of its territory.

records.name: Devitamamon
records.profile: A Digimon that treats everything it sees and touches as an object of its hatred. It chants magic in a lost, ancient high-level programming language.

records.name: Manbomon
records.profile: An Armor-body Mutant Digimon that evolved through the power of the ’Digimental of Light’. Highly rare, it is scarcely seen in the Network seas.

records.name: Jijimon
records.profile: An elder Digimon that has survived since the very creation of the Digital World. It is said that, when crisis threatened the Digital World, this elder guided the chosen humans.

records.name: Pajiramon
records.profile: One of the ’Deva Digimon’, this one is a Perfect form in the shape of a sheep. It is under the command of Zhuqiaomon, one of the Four Holy Beasts, and dominates the world of dreams with its great influence.

records.name: Cockatrimon
records.profile: A Giant Bird Digimon who lived for so long on the ground that it became unable to fly. It attacks very ferociously using its developed body and legs as weapons, but it possesses very low energy efficiency.

records.name: Daipenmon
records.profile: A Digimon that inherited the full powers of the legendary Ten Warriors. With the addition of mysterious unknown powers, its skill with ice surpasses even that told in the legends.

records.name: Vikaralamon
records.profile: One of the ’Deva Digimon’, this one is a Perfect form in the shape of a boar.

records.name: Aegiomon
records.profile: This Digimon loves peace and doesn’t especially care for combat. However, it conceals many latent hidden powers, and when it fights to protect someone, its actual combat abilities are exceptional.

records.name: Magnagarurumon
records.profile: A transcendent-species Digimon and user of light-based abilities. It is said its power surpasses that of the legendary Ten Warriors. A master of high-speed travel, when it’s equipped with its flight unit, it can fly at close to the speed of light.

records.name: Surfimon
records.profile: An enhanced version of an aquatic Digimon, this one can move quickly on land as well. A maverick, it is very proud and has a distaste for acting in groups as fish normally do.

records.name: Aerovdramon
records.profile: A legendary Digimon. It evolved after many battles from V-dramon, a rare species. It now has stronger fighting skills due to its flying ability, its hard skin, and its sharp claws and horns.

records.name: Rinkmon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon born from the sample data of an experiment that accelerated particles to the speed of light in a particle accelerator.

records.name: Hyougamon
records.profile: A species of Ogremon that lives in cold places. It is highly protective of its territory and angrily attacks any Digimon who dare take one step into it.

records.name: Moosemon
records.profile: A Digimon respected as the ’Protecting God of the Mountain’. All who would sully its mountain are fated to lose their lives at its hands.

records.name: Ranamon
records.profile: A Digimon that used to be primarily active in the oceanic part of the weather forecast system, which might account for its sharp intuition and oft-changing emotions.

records.name: Calamaramon
records.profile: A half-beast-half-human Digimon, it uses his tentacles for both attack and defense, spinning them to attack its enemies or retracting them to protect its body.

records.name: Gryzmon
records.profile: A Digimon that can easily avoid and parry enemy attacks, despite the size of its body. With its outstanding intuition for combat, it doesn’t have to rely solely on its offensive capabilities.

records.name: Marindevimon
records.profile: A subspecies of Digimon. It is full of hatred because it lives alone in the deep sea. Its two tentacles have their own will and are free to attack on their own.

records.name: Raremon
records.profile: An Undead Digimon whose muscles rotted and fell off all over its body. It has attempted to cling to life by mechanizing its body, but it remains highly unstable, and the data that mechanized it has begun to collapse.

records.name: Kaisergreymon
records.profile: A transcendent species of Digimon that possesses fire powers and is said to surpass the power of even the legendary Ten Warriors.

records.name: Phelesmon
records.profile: A Fallen Angel Digimon resembling a nobleman. It is said it grants people’s wishes, but in exchange it steals their souls.

records.name: Flawizarmon
records.profile: A Demon Man Digimon that Armor-evolved through the Digimental of Courage. While Wizarmon is shy and hesitant to show its face, FlaWizarmon is the total opposite, confidently showing its true face for all to see.

records.name: Cho Hakkaimon
records.profile: It was once an Angel Digimon, but it was transformed by Ofanimon into its current form and banished from heaven for committing a crime. It has a lighthearted personality, but it turns ferocious when it’s hungry.

records.name: Qinglongmon
records.profile: One of the legendary Four Great Dragons, its wields thunder with godlike powers and presence. Unbound by the shackles of black-and-white thinking, it serves as a guide to Digimon faced with tough choices.

records.name: Dynasmon
records.profile: One of the Royal Knights, it pledges absolute loyalty to the lord who values justice as much as it does. It has the capabilities of a flying dragon and boasts unmatchable strength in its Chrome Digizoid dragon armor.

records.name: Ulforcevdramon
records.profile: A Digimon that can freely manipulate the holy Ulforce and has the power to reconstruct digital data. It is the sacred knight predicted in the legends. It wears armor made of Blue Digizoid and has godly speed.

records.name: XV-mon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from a V-mon that came into its inherent powers. With the enhanced attack power of its highly-developed limbs, it can reduce rocks the size of mountains into dust. One of its derived species is V-dramon.

records.name: Mikemon
records.profile: A Beast Digimon that resembles a tortoiseshell cat at first glance. It is said that Nyaromon’s data, which lay dormant inside its body in the child form, has now manifested itself in the adult form.

records.name: Digmon
records.profile: A Digimon that Armor-evolved from Armadimon through the Digimental of Knowledge. It has the attribute of earth. Skilled in the use of the drills on its nose and arms, it specializes in underground combat.

records.name: Sabmarimon
records.profile: A Digimon that Armor-evolved from Seahomon through the Digimental of Sincerity. It has the attribute of water. When it’s underwater, it commands full freedom of movement, with performance surpassing that of normal aquatic Digimon.

records.name: Thunderbirmon
records.profile: A Digimon that Armor-evolved through the Digimental of Friendship. Capable of summoning thunderclouds with its booming voice, it wields lightning via the horn on its head. Its temper is as wild as a thunderstorm.

records.name: Mihiramon
records.profile: A Digimon that fiercely hunts down all its enemies. When on land, it runs faster than the wind, and when it takes to the air using its dual wings, it can break the speed of sound.

records.name: Majiramon
records.profile: A Digimon under the command of Qinglongmon, one of the Four Holy Beasts. It has a mercenary attitude, refusing to lift a finger unless there is profit to be had in it.

records.name: Tyilinmon
records.profile: A Digimon who, though it has been in its Perfect form since the genesis of the Digital World, is said to hold the same power as an Ultimate form. It has a very merciful personality, but it severely punishes those who kill unjustly.

records.name: Blackwargreymon
records.profile: A Dragon Warrior Digimon that earnestly pursues its own brand of justice. While its ’Brave Shield’ is missing its crest of Courage, it maintains the pride of a warrior, seeking always to understand why it has a soul.

records.name: Blackmegalogrowmon
records.profile: A Digimon that exemplifies the destructive nature of viruses, it is called the Black Destroyer Dragon. Its upper body is covered in Chrome Digizoid. Able to fly, it has outstandingly high attack and defense skills.

records.name: Blackseraphimon
records.profile: A hybrid Digimon that stole its data from Seraphimon and Mercuremon. It has ten bat wings and wields power directed toward evil. It also has Mercuremon’s tricks.

records.name: Ginkakumon
records.profile: One of the two ’Demon Gold and Silver Brothers’, together with its sister Kinkakumon. Ginkakumon loves Kinkakumon very much, always quietly keeping an eye on its sister and carrying alcohol for it. It knows no greater happiness than when its sister climbs aboard its abdomen.

records.name: Arkadimon (child)
records.profile: An Artificial Digimon created based on data from various Demon Digimon, with the purpose of generating a Super-ultimate form. It evolves by absorbing the data of other Digimon.

records.name: Lucemon
records.profile: A great Angel Digimon that stopped a war and brought peace to the ancient Digital World. Its talents were inherited by the Three Great Angels.

records.name: Funbeemon
records.profile: An Insect Digimon that belongs to the mysterious clandestine air base ’Royal Base’. Although its life is different from other Insect Digimon, it is strong, hardworking, and has a positive personality.

records.name: Swimmon
records.profile: A Tropical Fish Digimon with a vividly colored body. It lives in a coral reef in the warm waters just below the equator.

records.name: Ravmon
records.profile: A Digimon that used to be called the ’Silver Raven’ in the Genesis era until god’s wrath dyed one of its wings black. It is stealthy and kills its enemies with its remaining white Digizoid wing.

records.name: Warumonzaemon
records.profile: A Digimon that looks like Monzaemon. However, its atrocity makes it completely different. Its left arm is equipped with ’Bear Claw’. It gets along well with Metaletemon, to whom it offered a stuffed Warumonzaemon as a present.

records.name: Monzaemon
records.profile: A Digimon covered in mystery. It looks like a simple teddy bear, but there are several rumors as to who hides under the zipper on its back.

records.name: Knightchessmon (white)
records.profile: A Digimon throwing master who shoots huge darts. It is weak in close combat, but it confuses its enemies by leaping high above them using its thoroughbred leg strength.

records.name: Knightchessmon (black)
records.profile: A Digimon throwing master who shoots huge darts. It is weak in close combat, but it confuses its enemies by leaping high above them using its thoroughbred leg strength.

records.name: Grandgeneramon
records.profile: A Digimon formed through the forced Digicross of seven strong Digimon without any compression. It has no mind or ego and performs the lethal skills of its seven origin Digimon against whoever appears in its sight.

records.name: Chackmon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved through the Human Spirit. It harbors the ice power of the Ten Warriors. Although it pretends to belong to the noble class, it possesses a wealth of survival knowledge and precise skill with launcher technology.

records.name: Parasimon
records.profile: A special kind of Digimon: although it is an Ultimate form, it must parasitically live off of another creature in order to survive. By itself, it is rather weak, but when attached to a host Digimon, it can push its host’s abilities to their limits.

records.name: Dorbickmon
records.profile: A Fire Corps General Digimon. It leads the Dragon Digimon and fights with its rich combat experience. It likes stoking the flames of destruction with its overwhelming force and starts battles in peaceful areas.

records.name: Lighdramon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from V-mon using the Digimental of Friendship. It possesses the attribute of thunder and attacks its enemies with a lightning-quick electric shock.

records.name: Rizegreymon
records.profile: A Digimon with over half of its body mechanized. It also learned how to fly. It flies freely in the sky with its huge body and attacks using the Chrome Digizoid revolver in its left hand.

records.name: Aegiochusmon Blue
records.profile: A Digimon based on Cyborg-type data stored in its body, concentrated in the crystal in its chest. In this form, the data is particularly focused in the upper left of its body.

records.name: Knowledge of the Steel Knights
records.profile: Here is marked the heart of samurai standing solemnly. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Insekimon
records.profile: A rare Mineral Digimon formed by mixing meteor fragments into Gottsumon’s mineral body. These fragments then appeared on the surface.

records.name: Mercurymon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It is a witty god and the fastest of all Digimon. It cannot remain in one place, wandering the Digital World at a speed that cannot be captured by the naked eye.

records.name: Kinkakumon
records.profile: A Digimon who is considered with its brother Ginkakumon to be ’the Demon Gold and Silver Brothers’. A naturally reckless character, it rushes into love affairs and falls in love easily, but beats down anyone not in its favor.

records.name: Bearmon
records.profile: A Digimon with a timid personality. It is very gentle and quickly befriends other Digimon. In battle it displays incredible fighting ability and uses its fist protected by a leather belt.

records.name: Darktyranomon
records.profile: A Digimon originally belonging to the Tyranomon species. It was infected by an evil computer virus. The data that constitutes its body developed a bug that transformed it into a violent Digimon.

records.name: Tyrantkabuterimon
records.profile: The ’King of Bugs’. It is the leader of all Insect Digimon. Its den is the ’Under Forest’, deep underneath the dark forest. It is said it is only active at night.

records.name: Yukiagumon
records.profile: A type of Agumon that lives in cold areas. It is naughty and frolics all the time. It excels at hiding in the snow and attacking when the enemy is vulnerable

records.name: Yukidarumon
records.profile: An Icy Snow Digimon whose whole body is covered in crystals of snow and ice. Despite its cold appearance, it possesses a very warm and gentle personality.

records.name: Craniummon
records.profile: The most respectful Digimon of the Royal Knights. It pays respect even to its enemies during combat. It holds the legendary magic spear Claiomh Solais and the sturdy shield Avalon.

records.name: Shinegreymon
records.profile: A Light Dragon Digimon that stores the burning energy of the Sun and uses it in battle. No matter how many times it falls, it always gets back up due to its strong spirit. It can summon the Geogrey Sword, in which the power of the earth is concentrated.

records.name: Breakdramon
records.profile: A Digimon with abilities and powers that surpass those of other Machine Digimon. It has the ability to hack certain pieces of heavy construction equipment while they are evolving, capturing them.

records.name: Miragegaogamon
records.profile: A Beast Knight Digimon with its whole body covered in Chrome Digizoid armor. It moves at such incredible speed that it tricks its enemies into believing it is just a mirage. It can also cut it enemies instantly using Gale Claws.

records.name: Deathmon
records.profile: A Digimon who was originally a high-level Angel Digimon. It fell to the Dark Area and is now one of the Demon Lords.

records.name: Vademon
records.profile: An Alien Digimon that looks like it has come from the farthest reaches of the universe. However, there are rumors that it was born from a plant’s fruit.

records.name: Devidramon
records.profile: An Evil Beast Digimon called from the Dark Area by Devimon. It was born from a hacker who misused the network. It freezes its enemies by staring at them with its four glowing red eyes.

records.name: Dynasmon
records.profile: One of the Royal Knights, it pledges absolute loyalty to the lord who values justice as much as it does. It has the capabilities of a flying dragon and boasts unmatchable strength in its Chrome Digizoid dragon armor.

records.name: Magnamon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved through the Digimental of Miracles. Dressed in Chrome Digizoid armor, its power is comparable to that of an ultimate form. In times of crisis, it can escape using the power of miracles.

records.name: Indaramon
records.profile: One of the ’Deva’ Digimon. It is a perfect form Digimon that looks like a horse. It is under the control of Zhuqiaomon, one of the Four Holy Beasts. It has a very arrogant and snobbish personality.

records.name: Kyubimon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved from a very skilled and experienced Renamon. It is a bewitching fox. Although it is not very strong, it has a strong spirit and a variety of skills.

records.name: Sandiramon
records.profile: One of the ’Deva’ Digimon. It is a perfect form Digimon that looks like a snake. It is under the control of Zhuqiaomon, one of the Four Holy Beasts. It is the cruelest and most cunning of the Deva Digimon.

records.name: Zhuqiaomon
records.profile: A legendary Digimon protecting the southern region of the Digital World. One of the Four Holy Beasts, it has a wild temper and is hostile towards human interference to the Digital World.

records.name: Dukemon: Crimsonmode
records.profile: A Digimon covered in crimson armor. It was born when Dukemon released all its hidden power. It has wings produced by overflowing energy. It holds the divine lance ’Gungnir’ and the divine sword ’Blutgang’.

records.name: Lilithmon
records.profile: A Digimon that was originally a high-ranking Angel Digimon. It fell to the dark side and is now called ’The Goddess of Darkness’. It is one of the Seven Great Demon Lords. Anything touched by the nails of its left hand will corrode.

records.name: Goddramon
records.profile: A Holy dragon Digimon with a shining, golden body. It is one of the Four Great Dragons. It is small and wears in its right hand Umon the Blue Thunder, a weapon of regeneration, and in its left hand Amon the Red Flame, a weapon of destruction.

records.name: Parasimon
records.profile: A special kind of Digimon: although it is an Ultimate form, it must parasitically live off of another creature in order to survive. By itself, it is rather weak, but when attached to a host Digimon, it can push its host’s abilities to their limits.

records.name: Dynasmon
records.profile: One of the Royal Knights, it pledges absolute loyalty to the lord who values justice as much as it does. It has the capabilities of a flying dragon and boasts unmatchable strength in its Chrome Digizoid dragon armor.

records.name: Dukemon
records.profile: A Digimon born from Megidramon. Its name is also linked to the Royal Knights. Its weapons, Gram and Aegis, form from its armor, which is made completely of Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Duftmon
records.profile: A Digimon regarded by the Royal Knights as one of the best strategists. It has the skill to lead the Royal Knights. When it gets to the battlefield itself, it changes to Leopardmode.

records.name: Apoclymon
records.profile: A Dark Digimon born from negative human feelings, its appearance was foretold in ancient prophecies. It seeks to pull the Digital World into the dark world that spreads out infinitely.

records.name: Darcmon
records.profile: A junior Angel Digimon with two pairs of wings, it serves as the vanguard of the Angel Digimon. Fighting always at the front lines, it has been nicknamed the ’Goddess of the Battlefield’.

records.name: Plutomon
records.profile: A Digimon with several mouths lined with sharp teeth. It finds joy only in biting villains. Its mouths make chattering noises in search of prey.

records.name: Griffomon
records.profile: A Synthetic Digimon with a Beast’s torso and a Bird’s head, wings, and legs. There is something like a snake attached to his tail.

records.name: Hippogriffomon
records.profile: A Mythical Beast Digimon in the shape of a synthetic beast. It is said it evolves into Griffomon, but further details are unknown.

records.name: Unimon
records.profile: A synthetic Digimon with a unicorn’s horn and a pegasus’ wings. Its wings help it fly freely within the network, and its sharp horn helps it fight its enemies. It has a very wild temper.

records.name: Susanoomon
records.profile: A god from Eastern folklore. It is the strongest destruction god and is said to descend to the network system only in extraordinary situations. One part of it is responsible for regeneration and creates a new system after everything has been destroyed.

records.name: Kaiserleomon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved through the beast spirit. It carries the power of the Ten Warriors of Darkness. Released from the curse of Cherubimon, it is covered in Obsidian Digizoid and is called ’the Jet-black Lion’.

records.name: Bolgmon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved through the thunder Beast Spirit. It has a very cautious personality since it is born from the security system that protects the deepest part of a pyramid. It has thick armor and cannot move very fast, so it needs somebody to protect its back.

records.name: Lucemon
records.profile: A great Angel Digimon that stopped a war and brought peace to the ancient Digital World. Its talents were inherited by the Three Great Angels.

records.name: Lucemon Falldownmode
records.profile: The strongest of the Seven Great Demon Lords. It combines magic and holiness. It rebelled against god in very ancient times and was sent to the Dark Area along with many other Demon Lord Digimon.

records.name: Lucemon Larva
records.profile: A Digimon who manipulates Satanmode, the incarnation of evil. It is very small, lying inside the sphere held by Satanmode. It has its own will and can also talk.

records.name: Lucemon Satanmode
records.profile: The final form of Lucemon in the shape of the dragon that appears in the Revelation. It wears the crown of the seven deadly sins and holds Gehenna, which absorbs all attacks. The real Digimon is inside Gehenna.

records.name: Tigervespamon
records.profile: A Digimon whose thin silhouette boasts a unimaginably phenomenal amount of stamina. It never stops moving during battle.

records.name: Neptunemon
records.profile: A Digimon that lives in the Abyss Sanctuary in the deep sea. It is the god governing over all marine Digimon. Its body is covered in scales made of blue Digizoid. Its agility and speed are excellent.

records.name: Beowolfmon
records.profile: A Digimon who inherited power from the Ten Warriors of Light. It acquired unknown abilities, combining the powers of both man and beast. It has Trinitat in its right hand and Roland 2 in its left hand. It is very good at distance attacks.

records.name: Valkyrimon
records.profile: A Digimon covered in shiny armor. Its armor produces an aurora which regenerates the data of heroes fallen in battle and returns them to a new Digitama.

records.name: Sleipmon
records.profile: A member of the Royal Knights that dresses in Red Digizoid armor, which is known for its hardness. It moves with a superior, instantaneous speed, shooting light arrows with the sacred crossbow Muspelheim.

records.name: Anubimon
records.profile: A Digimon who monitors the Dark Area, the place where Digimon are transferred who died naturally or fell in battle. Fallen Angel Digimon are also transferred there while still alive.

records.name: Bastemon
records.profile: A Digimon called the ’Cat God’. It seduces its opponents with its bright, mysterious eyes and the jewels that cover its body. It is Nefertimon’s friend. It hides its strength behind its supple movements.

records.name: Nefertimon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from Tailmon using the Digimental of Light. It has the attribute of light and can gracefully fly in the sky. It can purify the corruption of the darkness using the power of intense light.

records.name: Ancientsphinkmon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors who saved the ancient Digital World. It possesses the attribute of darkness.

records.name: Falcomon
records.profile: A subspecies that developed the ability to fly with its wings. It is different from the original Falcomon who had strong legs. It acts like a ninja in many cases and, even though it can fly, it rides kites and throws shuriken.

records.name: Sethmon
records.profile: A Demon Beast Digimon who armor-evolved through the Digimental of Love. The Digimental of Love’s power was too great and uncontrollable, and its power was converted into the power of hatred.

records.name: Holsmon
records.profile: A Digimon born when Hawkmon armor-evolved through the Digimental of Love. It has the attribute of wind, being able to flap his wings and dance in the sky like the wind. Its specialty is air battles.

records.name: Angewomon
records.profile: A Digimon who has a calm personality but is very strict with twisted and evil individuals. It will punish them until they change. Thanks to its morals and power, it is praised as ’The Goddess’ of the Digital World.

records.name: Mermaimon
records.profile: A Digimon in the shape of a legendary mermaid that lives in the icy seas of the Digital World.

records.name: Lilithmon
records.profile: A Digimon that was originally a high-ranking Angel Digimon. It fell to the dark side and is now called ’The Goddess of Darkness’. It is one of the Seven Great Demon Lords. Anything touched by the nails of its left hand will corrode.

records.name: Ladydevimon
records.profile: A female fallen angel Digimon that holds dark power of incomparable purity. It is impossible to control it using personal computers. Its enemy is Angewomon.

records.name: Olegmon
records.profile: The general of the Golden Thief Army. Even amongst the generals, it possesses a superhuman strength, snatching up treasure from the seas it crosses. It eats up the gold and silver treasure its finds and improves its armor.

records.name: Cutemon
records.profile: A coward Digimon that likes pranks. It developed ear-like sensory organs and is very sensitive to any movement around it, hiding immediately when necessary. The muffler around its neck protects it against the cold.

records.name: Sakuyamon
records.profile: A Digimon fulfilling the role of a miko, the agent of God’s will. It has four kuda-kitsune around its waist-belt. The sound of its servants and the echo of its singing voice have the power to exorcise all evil.

records.name: Ofanimon
records.profile: A Digimon that spreads love and mercy. It is the ultimate form of the female Angel Digimon. It protects the Kernel (the God’s land) together with Seraphimon and Cherubimon.

records.name: Beelzebumon Blastmode
records.profile: An aloof Digimon with a powerful spirit. It has two double-barreled shotguns, the Berenjena. It is feared as one of the Seven Great Demon Lords and looks for battles with strong Digimon.

records.name: Mervamon
records.profile: A form of Minervamon that has, through time and experience, acquired an adult’s grace and charm. It fascinates everyone around it with its refined and sophisticated gestures, even during battles.

records.name: Venusmon
records.profile: The goddess of love. It brings flowers to desolate lands together with its friends Olive and Hotan, conveying love and harmony. To suppress its bewitching nature, it hides its eyes, looking instead at a higher truth through its mind’s eye.

records.name: Shoutmon x5
records.profile: A Finalist form born by combining its x4 Victory form with Sparrowmon. It now has Sparrowmon’s flight ability.

records.name: Grain of gloom
records.profile: Grain hiding the book of darkness. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Crystal of gloom
records.profile: Crystal hiding the book of darkness. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Knowledge of the dark
records.profile: Here is marked the heart of darkness, that wriggles quietly. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Aegiochusmon Dark
records.profile: A Digimon based on Evil-type data stored in its body, concentrated in the crystal in its chest. In this form, the data has infested throughout its body.

records.name: Aegiochusmon Dark
records.profile: A Digimon based on Evil-type data stored in its body, concentrated in the crystal in its chest. In this form, the data has infested throughout its body.

records.name: Aegiochusmon Dark
records.profile: A Digimon based on Evil-type data stored in its body, concentrated in the crystal in its chest. In this form, the data has infested throughout its body.

records.name: Arkadimon (Ultimate)
records.profile: A Digimon who evolved to an Ultimate form by absorbing dark data. It can also achieve the Ultimate evolution through its tamer, and when not controlled by its tamer, it can transform into various other forms.

records.name: Arkadimon (adult)
records.profile: A Digimon who initially evolved from Arkadimon. Several long tentacles are attached to its arms, greedily absorbing the opponent’s data, but it remains unknown whether it possesses any self-awareness.

records.name: Arkadimon (perfect)
records.profile: A Digimon who evolved a second time by capturing Seraphimon’s light data. It used to be slim, but now it has a different style. It has one more evolution until it reaches the Ultimate form.

records.name: Ofanimon Falldownmode
records.profile: A Digimon who destroyed its own emotions. It now embraces anger to such an extent that it has fallen into madness against the continuously increasing misdeeds of the world. It hunts down all those who get in the way of it achieving its own justice.

records.name: Imperialdramon FM
records.profile: A Digimon who unleashed its full power in dragon mode and transformed into a legendary dragon warrior. It is incredibly intelligent and capable of controlling its violent power.

records.name: Cyberdramon
records.profile: A Blue Flare Digimon wearing armor made of a special rubber and holding a sharp lance. It can spin its tail and ride atop it to launch further attacks.

records.name: Rapidmon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon evolved from Gargomon. It moves at close to the speed of light and controls a large ear-type radar. It always captures its prey, even in the darkness.

records.name: Murmusmon
records.profile: Formerly a senior Angel, it fell from Heaven and became a Demon Lord. It is called an ’Earl’ and gathers 30 demon legions. It sows the seeds of conflict when it transforms into other Digimon.

records.name: Marindevimon
records.profile: A subspecies of Digimon. It is full of hatred because it lives alone in the deep sea. Its two tentacles have their own will and are free to attack on their own.

records.name: Wendimon
records.profile: A Digimon who dark-evolved from a Lopmon consumed by hatred and anger. Deep down it has a kind heart, but it is hidden under a destructive impulse. It can manipulate time and space in its need to destroy.

records.name: Andiramon
records.profile: A Grappling Digimon. It can easily control its mind and harden its body, having kaleidoscopic attack and defense skills. When it receives damage from the enemy, it can instantly recover using the power of its mind.

records.name: Cherubimon (evil)
records.profile: Although one of The Three Great Angels, it transformed into an evil form for some mysterious reason. It is incredibly powerful and capable of destroying the equilibrium in the Digital World. It passes divine judgement on all living things.

records.name: Agumon Hakase
records.profile: A genius Agumon with a Digital Monster PhD degree from the Digital World University.

records.name: Shinegreymon Burstmode
records.profile: A unique Digimon. It appears when Shinegreymon temporarily reaches the limit of its abilities through Burst evolution. It wears a special, high-energy solar flame aura.
