records.name: Rosemon Burstmode
records.profile: A temporary form of Rosemon who reached the limit of its abilities through Burst Evolution. It has an aura of love and beauty. It gracefully attacks its enemies with the Tiferet on its chest, which is engraved with the symbol for love and beauty.

records.name: Ravmon Burstmode
records.profile: A unique Digimon. It appears when Ravmon temporarily reaches the limit of its abilities through Burst evolution. It wears an aura made of all the energy in the atmosphere.

records.name: Shinegreymon Burstmode
records.profile: A unique Digimon. It appears when Shinegreymon temporarily reaches the limit of its abilities through Burst evolution. It wears a special, high-energy solar flame aura.

records.name: Rosemon Burstmode
records.profile: A temporary form of Rosemon who reached the limit of its abilities through Burst Evolution. It has an aura of love and beauty. It gracefully attacks its enemies with the Tiferet on its chest, which is engraved with the symbol for love and beauty.

records.name: Ravmon Burstmode
records.profile: A unique Digimon. It appears when Ravmon temporarily reaches the limit of its abilities through Burst evolution. It wears an aura made of all the energy in the atmosphere.

records.name: Darkdramon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon that is supposed to be the weapon of last resort for the mechanized ’D-brigade’.

records.name: Lotusmon
records.profile: A Fairy Digimon that looks like a lotus, the flower said to be blooming in heaven. A lady with a calm and gracious personality, it has the power to make one forget one’s sorrows and have happy dreams.

records.name: Wormmon
records.profile: A timid and weak Digimon that possesses genuine tenderness. It is the descendant of an ancient family and can use Digimentals and armor-evolve. If it grows, it will demonstrate unbelievable strength.

records.name: Stegomon
records.profile: A Digimon who uses the blades on its back both to repel enemy attacks and perform counterattacks. It can move in the desired direction by its own will.

records.name: Quetzalmon
records.profile: A bewitching armor-form Beast that evolved through the Digimental of Light. It is the embodiment of the sun and wind in the shape of a winged white snake.

records.name: Belphemon: Ragemode
records.profile: A Digimon awakened after a long sleep. It is the incarnation of anger. Its ferocious roar is enough to disintegrate the data of weaker Digimon. It considers everything that comes into its sight to be an enemy.

records.name: Gizmon: Prototype
records.profile: A Digimon without an ego. It was upgraded artificially and carries out its missions according to the orders it receives. Its lethal skills are ’PT Laser’, where it releases a small laser through its red eyes, and ’PT Helix’, where it spins and cuts down its enemies.

records.name: Gizmon: Attacker
records.profile: A Digimon without an ego. It was upgraded artificially and carries out its missions according to the orders it receives. All its lethal skills are more powerful than those of Gizmon: Prototype. They are ’AT laser’, ’AT Helix’, and ’AT Hacking’.

records.name: Gizmon: X-Terminator
records.profile: A Digimon without an ego. It was upgraded artificially and carries out its missions according to the orders it receives. It focuses on a single enemy and does not rest or stop until the termination of the target or itself.

records.name: Marinangemon
records.profile: A Fairy Digimon living in the Internet sea. It rarely shows itself to others. An Angemon in name only, it is a completely different species in terms of ecosystem.

records.name: Queenchessmon
records.profile: The strongest Digimon of the Chessmon series. It has extreme range and offensive capability. It is a reliable presence and protects the coward Kingchessmon. Its immense offensive capabilities are sometimes even considered inhumanly powerful.

records.name: Rookchessmon
records.profile: A Digimon in the shape of a fort. It boasts an impregnable defense. Although a huge Digimon, it is very fast. It repels and counters enemy attacks.

records.name: Dianamon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It presides over water and ice and can act even when the surrounding temperature is absolute zero. Like the moon, it is two-faced and hides a terrible power under its beauty.

records.name: Paunchessmon (white)
records.profile: A Puppet Digimon born from the data of a supercomputer’s chess game. While it is normally a weak general infantry Digimon, it has hidden powers and can be propelled into Ultimate-level class through victories.

records.name: Knightchessmon (white)
records.profile: A Digimon throwing master who shoots huge darts. It is weak in close combat, but it confuses its enemies by leaping high above them using its thoroughbred leg strength.

records.name: Rookchessmon
records.profile: A Digimon in the shape of a fort. It boasts an impregnable defense. Although a huge Digimon, it is very fast. It repels and counters enemy attacks.

records.name: Queenchessmon
records.profile: The strongest Digimon of the Chessmon series. It has extreme range and offensive capability. It is a reliable presence and protects the coward Kingchessmon. Its immense offensive capabilities are sometimes even considered inhumanly powerful.

records.name: Paunchessmon (black)
records.profile: A Puppet Digimon born from the data of a supercomputer’s chess game. While it is normally a weak general infantry Digimon, it has hidden powers and can be propelled into Ultimate-level class through victories.

records.name: Knightchessmon (black)
records.profile: A Digimon throwing master who shoots huge darts. It is weak in close combat, but it confuses its enemies by leaping high above them using its thoroughbred leg strength.

records.name: Bishopchessmon
records.profile: A Puppet Digimon that makes full use of its bombing skills. The attack range is long, and it can hit enemies from a long distance. Its catchphrase is ’Lord, grant me strength!’

records.name: Kingchessmon
records.profile: A King Digimon who had to work behind the scenes in order to build the Great Empire of Chessmon. However, no one actually knows what the Great Empire of Chessmon is, and no one shows any interest in it.

records.name: Aldamon
records.profile: This Digimon transcended legend when it inherited the power of the Ten Warriors of Fire, granting it wondrous powers of both man and beast. Converting feelings of anger and fear into the power of justice, it plunges unhesitantly into battle.

records.name: Fladramon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from V-mon through the Digimental of Courage. Its combat skills are similar to a burning flame, and it hits its enemies with extremely strong knuckles.

records.name: Sistermon Blanc
records.profile: A girl Digimon that looks like it is wearing a white rabbit. In contrast to its sister, Sistermon Noir, it is a little shy and is always hiding behind its sister.

records.name: Sistermon Noir
records.profile: A nun Digimon wearing a klobuk in the shape of a black cat’s head. It is Sistermon Blanc’s sister. It has a very cheerful personality, smoothing things over with its innocent behavior.

records.name: Examon
records.profile: A Digimon who belongs to the Royal Knights. It also stands at the pinnacle of all Dragon Digimon. Its nickname is ’the Dragon Emperor’.

records.name: Spinomon
records.profile: The biggest and strongest of the Dinosaur Digimon living in the Digital World. It has the same strength as Dinorexmon.

records.name: Darkdramon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon that is supposed to be the weapon of last resort for the mechanized ’D-brigade’.

records.name: Duftmon: Leopardmode
records.profile: The form Duftmon takes on the battlefield. It runs and flies through the world and strategically chooses its moves according to the conditions it faces in battle.

records.name: Ladydevimon
records.profile: An incredibly prideful Fallen Angel Digimon. It continues fighting with Angewomon, to the surprise of its tamer. Its wickedness can be seen when it takes hostages in battle.

records.name: Belphemon: Sleepmode
records.profile: A Digimon whose power is too great. It is said it can put data throughout the Digital World systems to sleep, but it cannot be proven if this is true.

records.name: Yggdrasil 7D6
records.profile: ’7D6’ is the created avatar of the mysterious host computer ’Yggdrasil’, who governs the whole Digital World Network. (The Real World corresponds to the year 2006).

records.name: Yggdrasil 7D6
records.profile: ’7D6’ is the created avatar of the mysterious host computer ’Yggdrasil’, who governs the whole Digital World Network. (The Real World corresponds to the year 2006).

records.name: Yggdrasil 7D6
records.profile: ’7D6’ is the created avatar of the mysterious host computer ’Yggdrasil’, who governs the whole Digital World Network. (The Real World corresponds to the year 2006).

records.name: Minervamon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It is a Snake Princess with arms that wield the large sword ’Olympia’. It has a strong-willed personality and jumps in whenever it catches the scent of battle.

records.name: Shoutmon DX
records.profile: A Crusade form that was born through the Digicross of Zekegreymon and Omegashoutmon. Its speed, fighting ability, and armor have become more intense, and it engages in battle passionately and yet with calm determination.

records.name: Petermon
records.profile: An eternal-boy Digimon who soars freely through the sky. It invites all Digimon who refuse evolution into the children’s world, Never-Everland. It masterfully wields its knife to punish all those who break their promises.

records.name: Aegiochusmon Holy
records.profile: A Digimon based on Angel-type data stored in its body, concentrated in the crystal in its chest. In this form, the data envelops its whole body, keeping its heart as pure and clean as glass.

records.name: Aegiochusmon Holy
records.profile: A Digimon based on Angel-type data stored in its body, concentrated in the crystal in its chest. In this form, the data envelops its whole body, keeping its heart as pure and clean as glass.

records.name: Aegiochusmon Holy
records.profile: A Digimon based on Angel-type data stored in its body, concentrated in the crystal in its chest. In this form, the data envelops its whole body, keeping its heart as pure and clean as glass.

records.name: Grain of the Holy
records.profile: A grain sealed in the book of light. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Crystal of the Holy
records.profile: A crystal sealed in the book of light. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Knowledge of the Holy God
records.profile: Here is marked the light that shines divinely. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Bacchusmon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It calls itself the heavy drinker of the Digital World. It has a cheerful personality and takes good care of others. It gathers Child and Adult Digimon and holds banquets, no matter the time of day.

records.name: Orochimon
records.profile: An eight-headed Digimon. While its primary head in the center is black, the rest of its heads are camouflage. It was born in the ancient Digital World with the purpose of preserving harmony.

records.name: Gekomon
records.profile: A coveted composer Digimon. It charms its surroundings and can play pleasant music, contrary to its looks. It can freely control its opponents’ feelings through the music it plays.

records.name: Bakumon
records.profile: A Digimon considered to have been generated by a medical machine for detecting brain waves. It has the ability to purify viruses and nightmares, for which it holds a Holy Ring.

records.name: Sanzomon
records.profile: A monk Digimon who continues its journey of trials in order to find enlightenment. It holds no weapon but only sings its sutras and leads the hearts gone astray. Some Digimon aim for the pure energy stored in its digicore.

records.name: Cho Hakkaimon
records.profile: It was once an Angel Digimon, but it was transformed by Ofanimon into its current form and banished from heaven for committing a crime. It has a lighthearted personality, but it turns ferocious when it’s hungry.

records.name: Sagomon
records.profile: A Digimon with a cheerful and easy-going personality. It transforms into a dreadful Digimon if even one of the skulls at its waist disappears. It was expelled from heaven and has set out on a journey in search of its true identity.

records.name: Gokuwmon
records.profile: A Battle Digimon born with combat instincts from the magma of the Boot Volcano. It is skilled in martial arts and witchcraft, and it craves fights with formidable enemies. However, it is banned by Sanzomon.

records.name: Targetmon
records.profile: An insistent Puppet Digimon. It is equipped with the super wide-angle, super high-resolution ’Yarimasu Gurasan’ (with shake correction). It locks on to its target with certainty and never lets it escape.

records.name: Muchomon
records.profile: A Bird Digimon who cannot fly, exactly like Penmon. It grew in the southern tropical countries. It always lives its life pleasantly.

records.name: Makuramon
records.profile: A Digimon under the control of Baihumon, one of the Four Holy Beasts. It is rather strange since it cannot speak and its emotions never appear on its face.

records.name: Jupitermon: Wrathmode
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It governs the sky and weather. On the battlefield it distinguishes skillfully between good and evil and applies divine punishment to the evil ones.

records.name: Dukemon X antibody
records.profile: A Digimon born from Megidramon. Its name is also linked to the Royal Knights. Its weapons, Gram and Aegis, form from its armor, which is made completely of Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Rosemon X antibody
records.profile: A beautiful female Digimon called the queen of flowers. On its breast it wears a Tiferet, a jewel in which is engraved the symbol of love and beauty. This jewel promises eternal beauty.

records.name: Lilimon X antibody
records.profile: A Digimon emerging from a beautiful blossoming flower. It has a tomboyish and whimsical character, but it is gentle and always lends a hand to the weak. A refreshing wind blows after it flies with its leaf wings.

records.name: Wargreymon X antibody
records.profile: A Digimon equipped with Dramon Killers on both its arms and the Brave Shield on its back. It is a veteran hero wearing armor made of Chrome Digizoid. It has a humanoid shape and is remarkably powerful and fast.

records.name: Blackwargreymon X antibody
records.profile: A Dragon Warrior Digimon that earnestly pursues its own brand of justice. While its ’Brave Shield’ is missing its crest of Courage, it maintains the pride of a warrior, seeking always to understand why it has a soul.

records.name: Dorumon
records.profile: A beast Digimon with an old-style interface on its forehead. It is speculated it is an experimental ’prototype Digimon’ from before the Digimon were discovered.

records.name: Omegamon
records.profile: A Holy Knight Digimon born through the fusion of miracles by the will of the good ones. Well-rounded in combat, it effortlessly wields weapons that themselves have the strength of two Digimon.

records.name: Paildramon
records.profile: A Digimon who jogress-evolved from XV-mon and Stingmon. Although it has the skilled attacks of dragons and the defensive ability of insects, the dragon attributes are a little stronger. It is very loyal and always protects its master.

records.name: Armagemon
records.profile: A super ultimate form Digimon, formed by scattering Kuramon everywhere and then putting all the pieces together in the real world. It took over Diablomon’s plans and seeks revenge against Omegamon.

records.name: Diablomon
records.profile: A greedy Digimon that swelled to huge proportions by absorbing any and all data in the Network. It aims to take over military computers and destroy the Real World in a nuclear attack.

records.name: Infermon
records.profile: An atrocious Digimon capable of invading any network and destroying its data. Its defense is remarkably improved thanks to the limbs attached to its cocoon body.

records.name: Apollomon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It has in its body a fiery energy with the power to purify all that exists. Its boiling blood and its pride give it the strength to control this fierce energy.

records.name: Sagittarimon
records.profile: A bewitching Beast Digimon who armor-evolved through the Digimental of Hope. It has been told its existence is an illusion. It is the superior species of Centalmon.

records.name: Harpymon
records.profile: A thief Digimon who steals precious data (treasure) from databases (ruins) and is called ’ the Scavenger’. It has wing arms and the upper body of a woman.

records.name: Jupitermon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It governs the sky and weather. On the battlefield it distinguishes skillfully between good and evil and applies divine punishment to the evil ones.

records.name: Wargreymon X antibody
records.profile: A Digimon equipped with Dramon Killers on both its arms and the Brave Shield on its back. It is a veteran hero wearing armor made of Chrome Digizoid. It has a humanoid shape and is remarkably powerful and fast.

records.name: Junomon
records.profile: A Digimon who stands on the battlefield as Jupitermon’s lover and protector. It predicts, scouts for, and eliminates insurgents who disobey Jupitermon’s will.

records.name: Jupitermon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It governs the sky and weather. On the battlefield it distinguishes skillfully between good and evil and applies divine punishment to the evil ones.

records.name: Jupitermon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It governs the sky and weather. On the battlefield it distinguishes skillfully between good and evil and applies divine punishment to the evil ones.

records.name: Jupitermon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It governs the sky and weather. On the battlefield it distinguishes skillfully between good and evil and applies divine punishment to the evil ones.

records.name: Jupitermon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It governs the sky and weather. On the battlefield it distinguishes skillfully between good and evil and applies divine punishment to the evil ones.

records.name: Jupitermon
records.profile: One of the Olympos XII. It governs the sky and weather. On the battlefield it distinguishes skillfully between good and evil and applies divine punishment to the evil ones.

records.name: Patamon vs Devimon
records.profile: All companions fall before the fearsome Devimon. Patamon, who cannot evolve to the Adult form, musters its courage. But still, it must confront Devimon!

records.name: Blitzmon
records.profile: A Digimon who evolved through the Human Spirit. It harbors the thunder power of the Ten Warriors. It can move at high speeds due to the high-voltage current running through its body. It uses a wrestling fighting style while scattering sparks.

records.name: Fairimon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved through the Human Spirit. It harbors the wind power of the Ten Warriors. It freely manipulates the air and can produce vacuums and mirages. It is also good at gathering information.

records.name: Chackmon
records.profile: A Digimon evolved through the Human Spirit. It harbors the ice power of the Ten Warriors. Although it pretends to belong to the noble class, it possesses a wealth of survival knowledge and precise skill with launcher technology.

records.name: Bancholeomon
records.profile: A Digimon who wins while respecting its sense of justice and holding to its beliefs. It would face even the Three Great Angels or the Royal Knights to make its sense of justice understood.

records.name: Tonosamamamemon
records.profile: An easygoing and constantly cheerful Digimon. It can barely walk due to its long hakama, which trails behind it. It always falls, rolls over, or gets tangled, making watchers laugh and relax.

records.name: Tonosamagekomon
records.profile: A Digimon that plays its main theme through the two horns on its shoulders. The tone of its voice, several octaves lower than Gekomon’s, imparts a feeling of Tonosama’s grandeur.

records.name: Angewomon
records.profile: A beautiful and gentle Angel Digimon with eight pure white wings. It has the compassionate ability to heal its allies’ wounds, but it can also destroy evil enemies.

records.name: Omegamon
records.profile: A Holy Knight Digimon born through the fusion of miracles by the will of the good ones. Well-rounded in combat, it effortlessly wields weapons that themselves have the strength of two Digimon.

records.name: Bagramon
records.profile: An Angel Digimon who originally governed over Death. It became disappointed with the world’s philosophy and started a revolt, for which it was punished. It now continues searching for a new philosophy to substitute the gods’ philosophy.

records.name: Deckerdramon
records.profile: An anti-aircraft Digimon that can be considered the natural enemy of all Flying Digimon. It shoots down flying Digimon with the various missiles mounted on its back. It takes advantage of its low height by concealing itself within the terrain.

records.name: Omegamon Zwart
records.profile: A Digimon born temporarily as a black Holy Knight by mixing in the recently discovered substance Black Digitron during the fusion process with Omegamon. It sports enhanced powers, not the least of which are the weapons on both its arms.

records.name: Skullknightmon
records.profile: A Digimon who signed a pledge of blood brotherhood with Deadlyaxemon. It is the older brother. It believes supremacy is gained through victory in battle, so it will use any cunning means to that end.

records.name: Beowolfmon vs Duskmon
records.profile: The fatal confrontation of the Ten Warriors of light and the Ten Warriors of darkness! With both the power of earthshaking conflict and the intimacy of a sibling rivalry, the battle fought for their pride and justice begins!

records.name: Angewomon vs Ladydevimon
records.profile: An exchange of slaps in the battle of wills between the angel and the demon! Everyone cringes at such ghastly strikes... and roots them on: ’Do it! Do it!’

records.name: Arresterdramon
records.profile: A Digimon who freed itself from Kinkoji and evolved. It wears battle armor made of a special rubber which offers it high defense without a loss in flexibility. It can also fly at high speeds with its grown wings.

records.name: Troopmon
records.profile: An Artificial Digimon built from stolen Digimon energy that was put into a body made of special rubber. It follows any command faithfully, like a machine. It shows no signs of fatigue but instead continues its numerous attacks.

records.name: Gaioumon vs Zanbamon
records.profile: A grudge fight between two samurai! For one’s path and one’s ideals, one must put its soul into the sword! Sparks will fly and swords will ring! All is decided by this one blow...

records.name: Plesiomon
records.profile: A Digimon that rarely shows itself. It appears to be surrounded by mist, disturbing the viewer’s vision. With its white body and refined appearance, it is a very mysterious figure.

records.name: Ultimatebrakimon
records.profile: The largest and heaviest Cyborg Digimon on the ground. Whenever it moves, the booster installed on its back sends a jet downwards to support its ultra-large body.

records.name: Dinorexmon
records.profile: A Carnivorous Dinosaur Digimon nicknamed ’the King of Terror’. Its strength stands completely apart from that of other Dinosaur Digimon. It fights with unparalleled ferocity.

records.name: Rusttyranomon
records.profile: The Ultimate form of Tyranomon. It has been evolving and surviving fierce battles since the creation of the Digital World.

records.name: Ex-tyranomon
records.profile: A Puppet Digimon that sneaked its way inside a stuffed animal in the shape of Tyranomon.

records.name: Mastertyranomon
records.profile: A Dinosaur Digimon that evolved from a Tyranomon who won fierce battles. The wounds on its body are proof of the many battles it has won and survived.

records.name: Dorugoramon
records.profile: An imaginary Digimon born from the ’Digicore’s Imagination’. It has evolved through the miraculous release of the digicore’s originality through the interface on its forehead.

records.name: Groundramon
records.profile: A Ground Dragon Digimon with a large arm on its back that is said to have transformed from a wing. It is able to dig in the ground very efficiently.

records.name: Opossummon
records.profile: A lovely Digimon who prefers sandy dry lands. It holds some balloons that contain a strong virus. It is hard to capture since it holds its balloons and jumps from place to place.

records.name: Ancientgarurumon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has the attribute of ’Light’ and saved the ancient Digital World. It was one of the first Ultimate forms to exist in the distant past. It was called ’the Brilliant Supreme Beast’.

records.name: Ancientirismon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has the attribute of ’Wind’ and saved the ancient Digital World. It was one of the first Ultimate forms to exist in the distant past. It has golden wings and is beautifully colored in rainbow colors.

records.name: Ancienttroiamon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has the attribute of ’Wood’ and saved the ancient Digital World. It was one of the first Ultimate forms to exist in the distant past. It boasts the largest size among the Ancient Digimon.

records.name: Grottemon
records.profile: A Digimon who harbors the power of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has earth abilities. Various weapons and instruments, both practical and artistic, have grown from its big palms and thick fingers.

records.name: Arbormon
records.profile: A Digimon who harbors the power of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has plant abilities. It comes from a medieval wooden doll blueprint, which was made into data. Its gimmicks are unexpectedly old-fashioned.

records.name: Mercuremon
records.profile: A Digimon who harbors the power of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has steel abilities. It is an intellectual type among the evil warriors and always provides wisdom.

records.name: Duskmon
records.profile: A Digimon who harbors the power of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has darkness abilities. The regrets of exterminated Digimon of various species, as well as ’forbidden data’ from the network, turn into an intense darkness and coagulate into Duskmon.

records.name: Magnakidmon
records.profile: A Digimon who loves single combat. When it comes to important fights, it shoots bullets indescriminately and becomes very trigger happy.

records.name: Bellestarmon
records.profile: A Digimon who masterfully wields two handguns. It is also called ’Beelzebumon Ready’. Its beloved handguns ’Rizoma de Loto’ can be regarded as the sisters of Beelzebumon’s ’Berenjena’.

records.name: Magnakidmon vs Bellestarmon
records.profile: A match between two true gun masters! The bullets fly from the two handguns and collide! Bullets! Bullets! Not even dust will remain of what was standing between the two.

records.name: Hisyaryumon
records.profile: A Digimon usually as calm and intelligent as a god. However, when the crystal-like sphere it’s holding is damaged, its godly wrath is awakened and it attacks with all of its body and soul.

records.name: Grademon
records.profile: A Warrior Digimon holding two swords. It is called ’the Golden Meteor’ because it always leads the vanguard bravely.

records.name: Spadamon
records.profile: A Digimon who can transform into huge weapons of unparallelled power. According to a saying, ’If held by an Angel, it will save the world. If held by a Demon, it will destroy the world’. It is a survivor of the ’Weapon Digimon’.

records.name: Chaosmon
records.profile: Typically, during a jogress evolution, the digicores of the two Digimon completely fuse, giving birth to a new Digimon. Chaosmon keeps the two digicores as they were before the jogress and maintains its form in an extremely incomplete state.

records.name: Bancholeomon
records.profile: A Digimon who wins while respecting its sense of justice and holding to its beliefs. It would face even the Three Great Angels or the Royal Knights to make its sense of justice understood.

records.name: Darkdramon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon that is supposed to be the weapon of last resort for the mechanized ’D-brigade’.

records.name: Liollmon
records.profile: A Holy Beast Digimon covered in golden fur. There seem to be very few surviving individuals, and their existence has been confirmed only recently. It is very territorial and doesn’t forgive those who enter its territory, even if they are the same species as it.

records.name: Loaderliomon
records.profile: A Machine Digimon born through the fusion of Beast Digimon data and the construction machine CAD data leaked from the server.

records.name: Aegisdramon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon born from the fusion of Plesiomon and Seadramon’s data. It is said that its gleaming armor made of a golden Digizoid alloy can remove all evil.

records.name: Junomon: Hysteric Mode
records.profile: This evil form of Junomon was awakened after sleeping within the innermost depths of its heart. This form is never noticed by its beloved Jupitermon, so it never suffers the judgment of good and evil.

records.name: Avengekidmon
records.profile: A Digimon born from a Digimon that was defeated by Magnakidmon. Overtaken by a ruthless desire for revenge, its digicore was overloaded by negative mind data, resulting in a sudden transformation.

records.name: Z’d Garurumon
records.profile: A subspecies of Metal Garurumon. It is a beast tank carrying a huge quantity of live ammunition, most importantly ’Z’d Gun’. The laser sight on top of its nose is improved for live ammunition and can hit several hundreds of targets.

records.name: Astamon
records.profile: A young noble Digimon from the Dark Area which binds together the devil-type Digimon. It has the power to surpass the ultimate form, and it attacks its enemies without mercy. Its favorite machine gun is Oro Salmon.

records.name: Vulcanusmon
records.profile: One of the Olympus XII, it is the Digimon god of smithery. Most well-known weapons,like Beelzebumon’s famous ’Berenjena’ are the work of Vulcanusmon. However, it prefers working behind the scenes to fighting in person.

records.name: Slashangemon
records.profile: A Power Digimon that commands the Angel corps ’Powers’ and leads all battles. When it comes to defending justice, it doesn’t fear even death.

records.name: Madleomon: Armed Mode
records.profile: A Digimon enraged by the pain caused by its extensive modifications. Due to its pain, it sees anything as an enemy.

records.name: Greyknightsmon
records.profile: Holding the gigantic Drill Lance as if it was a weapon wielded by a giant, and equipped with two gigantic gun turrets, Greyknightsmon overwhelms all Digimon.

records.name: Ofanimon
records.profile: A Digimon that spreads love and mercy. It is the ultimate form of the female Angel Digimon. It protects the Kernel (the God’s land) together with Seraphimon and Cherubimon.

records.name: Gokuwmon
records.profile: A Battle Digimon born with combat instincts from the magma of the Boot Volcano. It is skilled in martial arts and witchcraft, and it craves fights with formidable enemies. However, it is banned by Sanzomon.

records.name: Dorulumon
records.profile: An aloof Digimon with the traits of a lone wolf. The fur on its tail and head has hardened to become drills, which, together with its swift movements, allow it to use ’Hit and Run’ tactics as its favorite strategy.

records.name: Neptunemon
records.profile: A Digimon that lives in the Abyss Sanctuary in the deep sea. It is the god governing over all marine Digimon. Its body is covered in scales made of blue Digizoid. Its agility and speed are excellent.

records.name: Beelzebumon Vs Avengekidmon
records.profile: A gunfight between two Master Sharpshooters can only end if one makes a mistake. But if there is no mistake, will the bullets fly until the end of time?

records.name: Dukemon
records.profile: A Digimon born from Megidramon. Its name is also linked to the Royal Knights. Its weapons, Gram and Aegis, form from its armor, which is made completely of Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Qinglongmon
records.profile: One of the legendary Four Great Dragons, its wields thunder with godlike powers and presence. Unbound by the shackles of black-and-white thinking, it serves as a guide to Digimon faced with tough choices.

records.name: Holsmon
records.profile: A Digimon born when Hawkmon armor-evolved through the Digimental of Love. It has the attribute of wind, being able to flap his wings and dance in the sky like the wind. Its specialty is air battles.

records.name: Shoutmon X4
records.profile: Born from Shoutmon, Ballistamon, Dorulumon, and the Starmons’ powerful desire to gain absolute victory, Shoutmon’s only reason to exist is to enforce this conviction.

records.name: Shoutmon X4
records.profile: Born from Shoutmon, Ballistamon, Dorulumon, and the Starmons’ powerful desire to gain absolute victory, Shoutmon’s only reason to exist is to enforce this conviction.

records.name: Victorygreymon
records.profile: A subspecies of Wargreymon. This Digimon is a heroic dragon warrior carrying the crushing sword ’Dramon Breaker’. It developed its own fencing style that hits and smashes its enemies rather than cutting them.

records.name: Z’d Garurumon
records.profile: A subspecies of Metal Garurumon. It is a beast tank carrying a huge quantity of live ammunition, most importantly ’Z’d Gun’. The laser sight on top of its nose is improved for live ammunition and can hit several hundreds of targets.

records.name: Angemon
records.profile: A Digimon whose job is maintaining Good in the Digital World and keeping out Evil. It has six divine wings that are said to bring happiness.

records.name: Deckergreymon
records.profile: With the tremendous power it possesses, Decker Greymon will not get defeated even if it is facing multiple opponents.

records.name: Mervamon
records.profile: A form of Minervamon that has, through time and experience, acquired an adult’s grace and charm. It fascinates everyone around it with its refined and sophisticated gestures, even during battles.

records.name: Pumpmon & Gottsumon
records.profile: They might style themselves ’Servants of Darkness’, but they are better at goofing off than fighting. However, they never back down from a good trashing.

records.name: Lwemon
records.profile: AncientSphinxmon’s ’Human Spirit of Darkness’ was changed into its Duskmon form due to Cherubimon’s spell, but Lwemon is its true form released from this magical power.

records.name: Lwemon
records.profile: AncientSphinxmon’s ’Human Spirit of Darkness’ was changed into its Duskmon form due to Cherubimon’s spell, but Lwemon is its true form released from this magical power.

records.name: Duskmon
records.profile: A Digimon who harbors the power of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has darkness abilities. The regrets of exterminated Digimon of various species, as well as ’forbidden data’ from the network, turn into an intense darkness and coagulate into Duskmon.

records.name: Devimon
records.profile: A fallen angel Digimon. It originally belonged to the angel Digimon but fell to the dark side. It wears the symbol of evil engraved on its chest. It can control other Digimon using its evil intellect and fierce eyes.

records.name: Airdramon
records.profile: An intelligent Digimon that flies freely in the sky. They say that its existence is close to the gods, especially when it calls up storms with its cry. Its fierce personality makes it difficult for ordinary tamers to use.

records.name: Agumon
records.profile: A cheerful Digimon who uses its hard claws as weapons. Hidden in its small body lies boundless courage, a fearless personality, and an uncharted potential for growth.

records.name: Archnemon
records.profile: A queen Digimon that has the appearance of the spider queen from Greek legends. It governs over all Dokugumon. It is very intelligent and uses cunning tricks when attacking its prey. It can also take human shape.

records.name: Lucemon: Falldown Mode
records.profile: The strongest of the Seven Great Demon Lords. It combines magic and holiness. It rebelled against god in very ancient times and was sent to the Dark Area along with many other Demon Lord Digimon.

records.name: Lucemon: Falldown Mode
records.profile: The strongest of the Seven Great Demon Lords. It combines magic and holiness. It rebelled against god in very ancient times and was sent to the Dark Area along with many other Demon Lord Digimon.

records.name: Ofanimon
records.profile: A Digimon that spreads love and mercy. It is the ultimate form of the female Angel Digimon. It protects the Kernel (the God’s land) together with Seraphimon and Cherubimon.

records.name: Beelzebumon X-Antibody
records.profile: The wonders of its magic bullets have intensified through X-Evolution!

records.name: Magnamon X-Antibody
records.profile: A Digimon that digivolved through the power of the Digi-Egg of Miracles. Its armor is made of Chrome Digizoid, but it has been completely integrated with Magnamon’s body through X-Digivolution, to the point that it possesses a nature similar to muscles.

records.name: Crossmon
records.profile: The duty of this giant bird Digimon is to annihilate all invaders that enter the Digital World. Its golden armor made of Chrondigizoit deflects every attack.

records.name: Chaosmon: Valdur Arm
records.profile: This Chaosmon is believed to be one that was jogressed from Bancholeomon and Valdurmon, and the faces of each Digimon are visible on its arms.

records.name: Justimon
records.profile: A hero of justice Digimon trailing a red muffler. It can change its arm by replacing the plug of its Extend Transmitter.

records.name: Greymon Vs Skullgreymon
records.profile: A display of unbridled aggression. One highly intelligent, the other devoid of rational thought, their combat instincts are unmatched.

records.name: Ouryumon
records.profile: An imaginary Digimon born from the ’Daydream of a DigiCore’. It carries the X Antibody.

records.name: Alphamon
records.profile: One of the Royal Knights. It is also called ’the Aloof Hermit’. It wears a blue fluttering cloak, and its place is called ’the Empty Seat’.

records.name: Susanoomon
records.profile: A god from Eastern folklore. It is the strongest destruction god and is said to descend to the network system only in extraordinary situations. One part of it is responsible for regeneration and creates a new system after everything has been destroyed.

records.name: Darkness Bagramon
records.profile: This digifused form of AxeKnightmon and Bagramon became the greatest emperor of evil. The evil power spilling out of its body symbolizes that strength, and if a weak evil is bathed in it then it immediately becomes a grovelling subordinate.

records.name: Shinegreymon Vs Craniummon
records.profile: The fiery dragon challenges the ultimate shield to a battle for the ages. Bystanders to this epic combat risk annihilation but can’t look away from such magnificence.

records.name: Fragment of Fire
records.profile: Fragment used to evolve to a particular Zhuqiaomon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of Fire
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to a particular Zhuqiaomon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Fragment of the Tiger
records.profile: Fragment used to evolve to a particular Baihumon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of the Tiger
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to a particular Baihumon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Fragment of the Tortoise
records.profile: Fragment used to evolve to a particular Xuanwumon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of the Tortoise
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to a particular Xuanwumon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Fragment of Lightning
records.profile: Fragment used to evolve to a particular Qinglongmon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Grain of Lightning
records.profile: Grain used to evolve to a particular Qinglongmon. Can be found in specific Events.

records.name: Algomon Ultimate
records.profile: A Mutant Digimon, generated from a bug in an algorithm, hence its name. Due to its ability for high speed processing, it uses its countless ivy tendrils as tentacles, taking complete control of the battlefield.

records.name: Beelzebumon Blastmode
records.profile: An ultimate Demon Lord that raised its power to the utmost limits. Instead of evolving in wickedness, it maintained a calmer mental state, and its three, once-baleful red eyes have become green.

records.name: Metalseadramon
records.profile: A Digimon fully covered in Chrome Digizoid alloy. It is the final form of the Seadramon species. It was adapted for use in interception and repels most attacks with its body.

records.name: Shawujinmon
records.profile: A Digimon banished from the Digital World’s heaven. A certain Digicore was sealed among the nine beads of its necklace, and if even one bead is lost it will be transformed into a terrifying Digimon.

records.name: Wargreymon Vs Blackwargreymon
records.profile: What will decide the ultimate battle between two mighty and prideful warriors? Wargreymon’s courage or Blackwargreymon own brand of justice?

records.name: Medieval Dukemon
records.profile: An ancient ’Legendary Hero’ from another dimension, it is said that it transcends time and is still in existence.

records.name: Mervamon
records.profile: A form of Minervamon that has, through time and experience, acquired an adult’s grace and charm. It fascinates everyone around it with its refined and sophisticated gestures, even during battles.

records.name: Rosemon Burstmode
records.profile: A temporary form of Rosemon who reached the limit of its abilities through Burst Evolution. It has an aura of love and beauty. It gracefully attacks its enemies with the Tiferet on its chest, which is engraved with the symbol for love and beauty.

records.name: Splashmon
records.profile: Splashmon can change itself into a liquid and is able to take the shape of a human or Digimon at will. For this reason, spying is its specialty.

records.name: Examon
records.profile: A Digimon who belongs to the Royal Knights. It also stands at the pinnacle of all Dragon Digimon. Its nickname is ’the Dragon Emperor’.

records.name: Lordknightmon
records.profile: A member of the Royal Knights that governs over all Knight Digimon. It sticks to its own sense of justice, but if it must maintain peace, it can also use force to eliminate the weak.

records.name: Dukemon
records.profile: A Digimon born from Megidramon. Its name is also linked to the Royal Knights. Its weapons, Gram and Aegis, form from its armor, which is made completely of Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Sleipmon
records.profile: A member of the Royal Knights that dresses in Red Digizoid armor, which is known for its hardness. It moves with a superior, instantaneous speed, shooting light arrows with the sacred crossbow Muspelheim.

records.name: Craniummon
records.profile: The most respectful Digimon of the Royal Knights. It pays respect even to its enemies during combat. It holds the legendary magic spear Claiomh Solais and the sturdy shield Avalon.

records.name: Gankoomon
records.profile: A Digimon that rarely remains in the same place. It travels around the Digital World with next-generation Huckmon, seeking out and quashing any indications of abnormality or chaos.

records.name: Jesmon
records.profile: A Holy Knight Digimon endowed with the ability to sense the unusual phenomena and signs of chaos that occur all over the Digital World.

records.name: Duftmon
records.profile: A Digimon regarded by the Royal Knights as one of the best strategists. It has the skill to lead the Royal Knights. When it gets to the battlefield itself, it changes to Leopardmode.

records.name: Mastemon
records.profile: The Jogress evolution of Angewomon and Ladydevimon. It can manipulate both light and darkness, and has the power to cross through space-time.

records.name: Megidramon
records.profile: Although this Digimon is one of the Four Great Dragons, it was initially evil, and its very existence was regarded as a digital hazard. This power has been sealed, but if it were released, it could result in catastrophic damage.

records.name: Blackseraphimon
records.profile: A hybrid Digimon that stole its data from Seraphimon and Mercuremon. It has ten bat wings and wields power directed toward evil. It also has Mercuremon’s tricks.

records.name: Valdurmon
records.profile: A rare Holy Bird Digimon living in the stratosphere at 40,000m above ground. According to legend it is the guardian of the sky, and it is told that it is an ancient Digimon that has existed since the creation of the Digital World.

records.name: Agumon Black
records.profile: A Reptile Digimon which has grown up and become able to walk on two legs, it has an appearance like a tiny dinosaur. It is also a being that foretells evolution to a great and powerful Digimon.

records.name: Imperialdramon FM Vs Vikemon
records.profile: The legendary dragon warrior versus the ultimate Beast Man Digimon. Can a great intelect overcome the berserker’s rage?

records.name: Blizzarmon
records.profile: A Digimon that possesses power over Ice which bears the might of Ancientmegatheriumon. It’s closer to recklessness than dauntless courage.

records.name: Ancientmegatheriumon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors Digimon that saved the ancient Digital World. It is said that the power and bravery it possesses can adapt even to the intense cold of the freezing tundra.

records.name: Omegamon Vs Omegamon Zwart
records.profile: The white knight versus the black knight. The final Omega fight. Will one be deleted or the other one terminated?

records.name: Grandiskuwagamon
records.profile: The rarest species of insect type Digimon, it is said to be in an alliance with Blackwargreymon. Its special move is tearing up enemies with the huge Gran Killers in both arms.

records.name: Imperialdramon DM
records.profile: An ancient and incredibly powerful dragon Digimon. Besides its dragon form, it also has another form that can employ its full power. However, because this force is so big, it is difficult to control.

records.name: Blackgrowmon
records.profile: A Virus-species Digimon said to be the natural form of Growmon. Unlike a Growmon raised by a Tamer, it can roughly be described as having gone feral

records.name: Omegamon
records.profile: A Holy Knight Digimon born through the fusion of miracles by the will of the good ones. Well-rounded in combat, it effortlessly wields weapons that themselves have the strength of two Digimon.

records.name: Mugendramon
records.profile: A completely metal Digimon that was created by combining the parts of many cyborg Digimon. An evil program is written in its digicore and supplies it with infinite malice.

records.name: Darkdramon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon that is supposed to be the weapon of last resort for the mechanized ’D-brigade’.

records.name: Metalgarurumon X antibody
records.profile: A Digimon whose whole body is mechanized. It is the final form of Garurumon. It retains Garurumon’s speed despite the many heavy firearms attached to its body. It finds its enemies with the laser on the tip of its nose and swiftly shoots them down

records.name: Ancientgreymon
records.profile: Possessing the attribute of ’Flame’, it is one of the legendary Ten Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. An Ultimate who existed only in the distant past, it is told that its strength surpasses that of current Ultimates.

records.name: Holyangemon
records.profile: A Digimon responsible for surveilling the world as an agent of light. Whenever darkness approaches, it changes to battle mode. It fights the darkness with its sacred sword Excalibur in its right hand and its Beam Shield in its left hand.

records.name: Ancientbeatmon
records.profile: Possessing the attribute of ’Thunder’, it is one of the legendary Ten Warriors that saved the ancient Digital World. An Ultimate who existed only in the distant past, it has an appearance fused from many insects.

records.name: Cherubimon (evil)
records.profile: Although one of The Three Great Angels, it transformed into an evil form for some mysterious reason. It is incredibly powerful and capable of destroying the equilibrium in the Digital World. It passes divine judgement on all living things.

records.name: Ulforcevdramon X antibody
records.profile: This Holy Knight Digimon is the X-antibody carrier version of the mighty Ulforcevdramon.

records.name: Lucemon
records.profile: A great Angel Digimon that stopped a war and brought peace to the ancient Digital World. Its talents were inherited by the Three Great Angels.

records.name: Caturamon
records.profile: One of the ’Deva Digimon’, it is a Perfect Digimon with a form resembling the Dog. As a follower of the Four Holy Beasts Digimon Baihumon, it looks after its fellow followers Makuramon and Sinduramon as if they were its younger brothers.

records.name: Metalgreymon
records.profile: A Digimon with over half of its body mechanized. It is said to have the power of a nuclear warhead. Only a Greymon who has won numerous battles can evolve to this stage.

records.name: Shutumon Vs Ranamon
records.profile: Two Digimon who should be able to get along, were it not for Ranamon’s extreme jealousy of Shutumon’s looks.

records.name: Ancientmermaimon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has the attribute of ’Water’ and saved the ancient Digital World. An Ultimate who existed only in the distant past, it is the guardian goddess of the birthplace of Digimon, the ’Net Ocean’

records.name: Ancientirismon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has the attribute of ’Wind’ and saved the ancient Digital World. It was one of the first Ultimate forms to exist in the distant past. It has golden wings and is beautifully colored in rainbow colors.

records.name: Lotusmon
records.profile: A Fairy Digimon that looks like a lotus, the flower said to be blooming in heaven. A lady with a calm and gracious personality, it has the power to make one forget one’s sorrows and have happy dreams.

records.name: Devimon
records.profile: A fallen angel Digimon. It originally belonged to the angel Digimon but fell to the dark side. It wears the symbol of evil engraved on its chest. It can control other Digimon using its evil intellect and fierce eyes.

records.name: Metaletemon
records.profile: The ’King of Digimon’ studied its weak points after each battle and coated its whole body in Chrome Digizoid. Thus, a strong and dirty warrior was born!

records.name: Blackwargreymon X antibody
records.profile: A Dragon Warrior Digimon that earnestly pursues its own brand of justice. While its ’Brave Shield’ is missing its crest of Courage, it maintains the pride of a warrior, seeking always to understand why it has a soul.

records.name: Skullgreymon
records.profile: A menacing Digimon obsessed with fighting. Thanks to its battle instincts, it continues to fight even though it is nothing but bones. It is feared by other Digimon because it has no intelligence and fights indiscriminately.

records.name: Gigadramon
records.profile: A dark dragon Digimon developed at the same time as Megadramon. As a combat dragon that was armed to the teeth by further remodeling, its existence is the epitome of a fiendish computer virus.

records.name: Omegamon X antibody
records.profile: A Holy Knight Digimon born through the fusion of miracles by the will of the good ones. Well-rounded in combat, it effortlessly wields weapons that themselves have the strength of two Digimon.

records.name: Zeedmillenniumon
records.profile: Flying freely between space and time, it is a king of evil that is still trying to destroy all eras and worlds.

records.name: Beelzebumon X antibody
records.profile: The wonders of its magic bullets have intensified through X-Evolution!

records.name: Blastmon
records.profile: A Mineral Digimon with a super hard and heavy body. Its strength lies in attacks that use its body. Even if its crystal armor breaks, it can regenerate. It loves eating gems.

records.name: Jumbogamemon
records.profile: A gigantic Cyborg Digimon that added beam cannons to its entire body until the strength of its Metal Body’s shell was compromised.

records.name: Petaldramon
records.profile: Petaldramon is Arbormon’s main battle form, when he needs to deal immense damage as opposed to the versatility and maneuverability of his Arbormon form. He has complete control over his form as opposed to others who need to control their instincts first

records.name: Shakkoumon
records.profile: A Digimon who jogress-evolved from Armagemon and Angemon. It is believed that it might be an ancient Angel Digimon. Its neck and torso can rotate 360 degrees and allow it to attack in all directions.

records.name: Leviamon
records.profile: One of the Seven Great Demon Lords sleeping in the abyss of the Digital World. It has a huge body and is called the Devil Beast due to its very large jaw.

records.name: Shurimon
records.profile: A Mutant Digimon which blends in with nature and attacks the enemy from their blind spot like a ninja. It can extend its legs and arms like a spring.

records.name: Heraklekabuterimon
records.profile: An insect Digimon with a shining golden body. It has the features of both Kabuterimon and Kuwagamon. Its weapons are its huge horns and scissors, and it can fly at supersonic speed.

records.name: Ogudomon
records.profile: Ogudomon is a grotesque Super Demon Lord who has seven legs and eyes, as well as an eighth eye. It includes the whole of the Digital World’s sins, and moreover, is a mysterious personification with the ability to atone for them all.

records.name: Susanoomon
records.profile: A god from Eastern folklore. It is the strongest destruction god and is said to descend to the network system only in extraordinary situations. One part of it is responsible for regeneration and creates a new system after everything has been destroyed.

records.name: Ancientgarurumon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has the attribute of ’Light’ and saved the ancient Digital World. It was one of the first Ultimate forms to exist in the distant past. It was called ’the Brilliant Supreme Beast’.

records.name: Ancientwisemon
records.profile: Possessing the attribute of ’Steel’, it is one of the legendary Ten Warriors Digimon that saved the ancient Digital World. An Ultimate who existed only in the distant past, it is the wisest person in the Digital World.

records.name: Ancienttroiamon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has the attribute of ’Wood’ and saved the ancient Digital World. It was one of the first Ultimate forms to exist in the distant past. It boasts the largest size among the Ancient Digimon.

records.name: Lucemon Satanmode
records.profile: The final form of Lucemon in the shape of the dragon that appears in the Revelation. It wears the crown of the seven deadly sins and holds Gehenna, which absorbs all attacks. The real Digimon is inside Gehenna.

records.name: Baalmon
records.profile: An enlightened Digimon called ’The Noble King’. It encompasses all knowledge. The charms attached to its mantle contain the solutions to all possible problems. It serves as general of the Bagra army.

records.name: Deathmon
records.profile: A Digimon who was originally a high-level Angel Digimon. It fell to the Dark Area and is now one of the Demon Lords.

records.name: Vritramon
records.profile: A Digimon that possesses power over Flame which bears the might of one of the legendary Ten Warriors. It has skin that can withstand high temperatures and the ability to move even through lava.

records.name: Sinduramon
records.profile: One of the ’Deva Digimon’, it is a Perfect Digimon with a form resembling the Rooster. As a follower of the Four Holy Beasts Digimon Baihumon, it likes to quarrel and gossip above all else.

records.name: EXP Floppy Ultimate
records.profile: Use it in Digifuse as a Material Digimon to upgrade your Base digimon to the maximum level.

records.name: Dukemon: Crimsonmode
records.profile: A Digimon covered in crimson armor. It was born when Dukemon released all its hidden power. It has wings produced by overflowing energy. It holds the divine lance ’Gungnir’ and the divine sword ’Blutgang’.

records.name: Knightmon
records.profile: A loyal Digimon wearing armor made of Chrome Digizoid. It always disregards its own will and obeys the orders of its master. Depending on those orders, it can become either good or evil.

records.name: Kumbhiramon
records.profile: One of the ’Deva Digimon’, it is a Perfect Digimon with a form resembling the Rat

records.name: Vajramon
records.profile: A Digimon who seeks to find the truth about the physical and spiritual worlds. It is under the command of Xuanwumon, one of the Four Holy Beasts.

records.name: Vikaralamon
records.profile: One of the ’Deva Digimon’, this one is a Perfect form in the shape of a boar.

records.name: Gokumon
records.profile: A fugitive Digimon born from the data on a list of wanted criminals.

records.name: Jyureimon
records.profile: A Digimon that is extremely intelligent and powerful. It is the higher evolution of Woodmon.

records.name: X-Antibody
records.profile: The X-Antibody is a vaccine that makes Digimon immune to Program X.

records.name: Dorugamon
records.profile: A ferocious Beast Dragon Digimon that possesses the disposition of a beast and a dragon, it is such a heavyweight that most Digimon run away just at the sight of its shadow.

records.name: Doruguremon
records.profile: A massive Beast Dragon Digimon whose form was released through the Interface on its brow by the potent life-force data of the legendary beast, the ’Dragon’, which slept within the deepest parts of its Digicore, and that holds the alias of ’Final Enemy’

records.name: Death-X-Dorugoramon
records.profile: The undead version of Dorugoramon, it was created by Yggdrasil from Dorugamon’s data.

records.name: Flamon
records.profile: A Digimon that was transformed into a half-beast, half-man form when Agnimon lost its power.

records.name: Agnimon
records.profile: A Digimon that possesses power over Flame. Because its Digicore is wrapped in the Spiritual Fire which is called a holy blaze, it is able to freely manipulate flames.

records.name: Imperialdramon DM
records.profile: An ancient and incredibly powerful dragon Digimon. Besides its dragon form, it also has another form that can employ its full power. However, because this force is so big, it is difficult to control.

records.name: Plotmon
records.profile: A lop-eared, holy-type child Digimon. It is still a child, so it cannot employ its holy powers yet. It has yet to realize what its mission is.

records.name: Pegasmon
records.profile: A Digimon covered in golden armor. It armor-evolved from Patamon with the Digimental of Hope. It flies freely in the sky and holds absolute power, using its holy power against evil.

records.name: Blackrapidmon
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon evolved from Blackgalgomon. It moves at close to the speed of light and controls a large ear-type radar. It always captures its prey, even in the darkness.

records.name: Blacksaintgalgomon
records.profile: A type of Saintgalgomon specialising in attacking enemy territory, it is equipped with massive amounts of armaments. Although it lacks speed, it is able to utilise the heat-based weapons located all over its body to counterattack in all directions without moving an inch.

records.name: Dukemon X antibody
records.profile: A Digimon born from Megidramon. Its name is also linked to the Royal Knights. Its weapons, Gram and Aegis, form from its armor, which is made completely of Chrome Digizoid.

records.name: Miragegaogamon
records.profile: A Beast Knight Digimon with its whole body covered in Chrome Digizoid armor. It moves at such incredible speed that it tricks its enemies into believing it is just a mirage. It can also cut it enemies instantly using Gale Claws.

records.name: Blackmegalogrowmon
records.profile: A Digimon that exemplifies the destructive nature of viruses, it is called the Black Destroyer Dragon. Its upper body is covered in Chrome Digizoid. Able to fly, it has outstandingly high attack and defense skills.

records.name: Catchmamemon
records.profile: A Digimon born from the data of a Japanese prize machine.

records.name: Agumon
records.profile: A cheerful Digimon who uses its hard claws as weapons. Hidden in its small body lies boundless courage, a fearless personality, and an uncharted potential for growth.

records.name: Greymon
records.profile: A Digimon with a strong body and a hard, fine horn that boasts high combat power. Its head is covered with a hard shell that increases its defensive ability. It is also skilled at cooperating with its friends in combat.

records.name: Opossummon
records.profile: A lovely Digimon who prefers sandy dry lands. It holds some balloons that contain a strong virus. It is hard to capture since it holds its balloons and jumps from place to place.

records.name: Beelzebumon
records.profile: An aloof Digimon with a powerful spirit. It has two double-barreled shotguns, the Berenjena. It is feared as one of the Seven Great Demon Lords and looks for battles with strong Digimon.

records.name: Rosemon X antibody
records.profile: A beautiful female Digimon called the queen of flowers. On its breast it wears a Tiferet, a jewel in which is engraved the symbol of love and beauty. This jewel promises eternal beauty.

records.name: Algomon
records.profile: A Digimon that was generated from a bug in an algorithm. Due to its high-speed processing ability, it uses its countless ivy tendrils as tentacles, and takes complete control of a vast field.

records.name: Atlurkabuterimon Blue
records.profile: An evolution of Kabuterimon that was discovered within the tropical region of the Net Area. It is almost 1.5 times Kabuterimon’s size, and is quite large among Insect Digimon.

records.name: Cannonbeemon
records.profile: A massive Digimon that can completely cover a vast range with a bombarding barrage fired simultaneously from the gigantic arms container on top of it.

records.name: Frogmon
records.profile: An Armor-level Mutant Digimon that evolved through the power of the Digimental of Purity

records.name: Dokugumon
records.profile: Dokugumon are Insectoid Digimon who are said to have computer viruses running through their bodies. They are ruled over by their queen, Archnemon.

records.name: Picklemon
records.profile: A Fairy Digimon mastering magic. It can recite a sophisticated programming language from another dimension to produce miracles similar to magic.

records.name: Deathmeramon
records.profile: A Digimon that overcame water and ice, the weak points of the Meramon species. A blue burning chain winds around its body. Its skilled attacks, defensive abilities, and burning temperature are all enhanced.

records.name: Allomon
records.profile: An Armor-level Dinosaur Digimon that has a fierce rivalry with its fellow Dinosaur Digimon, Tyranomon

records.name: Giromon
records.profile: A Digimon patrolling the computer network, he fights off illegal intruders. Called the Net Keeper, he attacks any invading enemy with all his forces.

records.name: Warumonzaemon
records.profile: A Digimon that looks like Monzaemon. However, its atrocity makes it completely different. Its left arm is equipped with ’Bear Claw’. It gets along well with Metaletemon, to whom it offered a stuffed Warumonzaemon as a present.

records.name: Ancientmegatheriumon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors Digimon that saved the ancient Digital World. It is said that the power and bravery it possesses can adapt even to the intense cold of the freezing tundra.

records.name: Stingmon
records.profile: A very rare Insect Digimon that has the appearance of a human. It also has a hard exterior frame and the very swift moves of an insect.

records.name: Barbamon
records.profile: A Digimon living in the center of the Dark Area, he is one of Seven Great Demon Lords, the supervisors of the fallen angels. Obsessed with all the treasures in the network, he can employ any methods when it comes to materialistic issues.

records.name: Wargreymon Vs Mugendramon
records.profile: Dramon Killers versus the Ultimate Cyborg. Can the brave warrior defeat the Dark Master?

records.name: Nefertimon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from Tailmon using the Digimental of Light. It has the attribute of light and can gracefully fly in the sky. It can purify the corruption of the darkness using the power of intense light.

records.name: Nefertimon X antibody
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from Tailmon using the Digimental of Light. It has the attribute of light and can gracefully fly in the sky. It can purify the corruption of the darkness using the power of intense light.

records.name: Omegamon X antibody
records.profile: A Holy Knight Digimon born through the fusion of miracles by the will of the good ones. Well-rounded in combat, it effortlessly wields weapons that themselves have the strength of two Digimon.

records.name: Magnamon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved through the Digimental of Miracles. Dressed in Chrome Digizoid armor, its power is comparable to that of an ultimate form. In times of crisis, it can escape using the power of miracles.

records.name: Chaosmon
records.profile: Typically, during a jogress evolution, the digicores of the two Digimon completely fuse, giving birth to a new Digimon. Chaosmon keeps the two digicores as they were before the jogress and maintains its form in an extremely incomplete state.

records.name: Duftmon: Leopardmode
records.profile: The form Duftmon takes on the battlefield. It runs and flies through the world and strategically chooses its moves according to the conditions it faces in battle.

records.name: Griffomon
records.profile: A Synthetic Digimon with a Beast’s torso and a Bird’s head, wings, and legs. There is something like a snake attached to his tail.

records.name: Omegamon Alter-S
records.profile: A new face of Omegamon that was born from the fusion of Blitzgreymon and Cresgarurumon. Although it is a different individual from the Omegamon belonging to the Royal Knights, its multitype performance, which combines the special qualities of the two, hasn’t changed, and its strength is also on par with it.

records.name: Miragegaogamon Burstmode
records.profile: A Miragegaogamon that has temporarily reached the limits of its abilities through Burst Evolution, it is a unique form which wears a weapon and an aura of planetary-class high-energy.

records.name: Apollomon & Dianamon
records.profile: Two members of the Olympos XII, theirs is a story of Fire and Ice. Blood, boiling from the power of the sun, combines with the ice-cold beauty of the moon. United, their power could be immeasurable.

records.name: Tylomon
records.profile: An Armor-level Sea Dragon Digimon that holds the alias of ’Jet Plane of the Deep’ and has a fast moving speed underwater. It even contends for first place with Metal Seadramon.

records.name: Tylomon X antibody
records.profile: An Armor-level Sea Dragon Digimon that holds the alias of ’Jet Plane of the Deep’ and has a fast moving speed underwater. It even contends for first place with Metal Seadramon.

records.name: Duftmon X antibody
records.profile: A Digimon regarded by the Royal Knights as one of the best strategists. It has the skill to lead the Royal Knights. When it gets to the battlefield itself, it changes to Leopardmode.

records.name: Ornismon
records.profile: An Ancient Bird Digimon said to be extinct since ancient times. Called ’the Ruler of the Skies’, it attacks much larger Digimon from above.

records.name: Ranamon
records.profile: A Digimon that used to be primarily active in the oceanic part of the weather forecast system, which might account for its sharp intuition and oft-changing emotions.

records.name: Goddramon X antibody
records.profile: A Holy dragon Digimon with a shining, golden body. It is one of the Four Great Dragons. It is small and wears in its right hand Umon the Blue Thunder, a weapon of regeneration, and in its left hand Amon the Red Flame, a weapon of destruction.

records.name: Limit Break Metamorpher
records.profile: The Metamorpher can replace a missing copy of a Digimon when limit breaking.

records.name: Metamorpher Shard
records.profile: Six Metamorpher Shards can Digivolve into a Limit Break Metamorpher.

records.name: Vademon X antibody
records.profile: An Alien Digimon that looks like it has come from the farthest reaches of the universe. However, there are rumors that it was born from a plant’s fruit.

records.name: Omegamon Zwart D
records.profile: A form of Omegamon Zwart that was injected with a virus program by someone and turned into a beserker. The rampant virus program and lingering vaccine program within its body clashed with each other, causing it to become unstable, and its wounded body continues to rampage and tire without ever recovering.

records.name: Metaltyranomon X antibody
records.profile: A Cyborg Digimon who modified its body in order to become stronger. Just as Megadramon has superior aerial combat skills, Metaltyranomon has superior terrestrial combat skills.

records.name: Growmon
records.profile: A wild and ferocious Digimon. It is called ’the Deep Crimson Demon Dragon’. Its roar has the power to shake the ones who hear it, and its mouth spits burning flames. Depending on the tamer’s level of training, it can also fight in the name of justice.

records.name: Megalogrowmon
records.profile: A huge Cyborg Digimon whose upper body is covered in Chrome Digizoid. It can also fly using the verniers on its shoulders, making it immensely powerful in both terrestrial and aerial combat.

records.name: Megalogrowmon X antibody
records.profile: A huge Cyborg Digimon whose upper body is covered in Chrome Digizoid. It can also fly using the verniers on its shoulders, making it immensely powerful in both terrestrial and aerial combat.

records.name: Alphamon: Ouryuken vs Death-X-Mon
records.profile: The Holy Knight Alphamon wields the ultimate weapon Ouryumon against the ultimate threat, Death-X-Mon.

records.name: Mihiramon
records.profile: A Digimon that fiercely hunts down all its enemies. When on land, it runs faster than the wind, and when it takes to the air using its dual wings, it can break the speed of sound.

records.name: Cerberumon
records.profile: A Demon Beast Digimon called ’the Watchdog of Hell’. The claws on its four limbs are hard enough to be able to tear through a low-grade Chrome Digizoid alloy.

records.name: Cerberumon X antibody
records.profile: A Demon Beast Digimon called ’the Watchdog of Hell’. The claws on its four limbs are hard enough to be able to tear through a low-grade Chrome Digizoid alloy.

records.name: Gizamon
records.profile: An Aquatic Mammal Digimon that grew fins on its hands and feet in order to paddle through water. It is more suited for life in the water than on land.

records.name: Mantaraymon x antibody
records.profile: A Digimon who appears quick and aggressive but is actually quite the opposite. It swims gracefully in the seas of the Internet and has a gentle personality.

records.name: Agnimon
records.profile: A Digimon that possesses power over Flame. Because its Digicore is wrapped in the Spiritual Fire which is called a holy blaze, it is able to freely manipulate flames.

records.name: Chaosdramon
records.profile: A Digimon born from a successful experiment where Mugendramon, a combination of parts from numerous Cyborg Digimon, uses its abilities beyond the limits.

records.name: Slayerdramon
records.profile: A Dragon Man Digimon with its body covered in Chrome Digizoid scale armor.

records.name: Mamemon
records.profile: A Mutant Digimon that evolved in a harsh environment. Contrary to its cute appearance, it conceals a terrifying destructive power.

records.name: Princemamemon
records.profile: Having taken in data on the Net concerning a royal family, it is a prince of the Mamemon world. Partnering with King Etemon, it plays the part of a mock royal family of the Digital World, and that’s why it looks so gorgeous.

records.name: Princemamemon X antibody
records.profile: Having taken in data on the Net concerning a royal family, it is a prince of the Mamemon world. Partnering with King Etemon, it plays the part of a mock royal family of the Digital World, and that’s why it looks so gorgeous.

records.name: Ancientsphinkmon
records.profile: One of the legendary Ten Warriors who saved the ancient Digital World. It possesses the attribute of darkness.

records.name: Triceramon
records.profile: A bipedal Ceratopsian Digimon which has the appearance of the Triceratops, which has offensive ability competing for first or second among herbivorous dinosaurs. The sturdiness of its skin is top class among biological Digimon

records.name: Banchogolemon
records.profile: It is said that only Digimon who continue to emerge victorious in battles with fierce champions, without their spirit being broken, are able to acquire the title of Bancho. This Golemon is one of those warriors.

records.name: Banchomamemon
records.profile: It is said that only Digimon who continue to emerge victorious in battles with fierce champions, without their spirit being broken, are able to acquire the title of Bancho. This Mamemon is one of those warriors.

records.name: Banchostingmon
records.profile: It is said that only Digimon who continue to emerge victorious in battles with fierce champions, without their spirit being broken, are able to acquire the title of Bancho. This Stingmon is one of those warriors.

records.name: Bancholilimon
records.profile: A crimson tokko-fuku wearing fairy-type Digimon. The gorgeous petals it had in the days it was a Lilimon have been dyed a dark color, and the pretty impression it made is long gone. It believes in fighting for the underdog, having saved a lot of those who were attacked by evil Digimon.

records.name: Chaosdramon X antibody
records.profile: A Digimon born from a successful experiment where Mugendramon, a combination of parts from numerous Cyborg Digimon, uses its abilities beyond the limits.

records.name: Metalseadramon
records.profile: A Digimon fully covered in Chrome Digizoid alloy. It is the final form of the Seadramon species. It was adapted for use in interception and repels most attacks with its body.

records.name: Pinochimon
records.profile: A Puppet Digimon born from the cursed Jyureimon data. It is like a marionette but can also move by itself. It loves saying all kinds of lies.

records.name: Picklemon
records.profile: A Fairy Digimon mastering magic. It can recite a sophisticated programming language from another dimension to produce miracles similar to magic.

records.name: Rhinomon X antibody
records.profile: An Armor-level Mammal Digimon that evolved through the power of the ’Digimental of Miracles’. It is clad in armor made of Chrome Digizoid, and this armor cannot be destroyed even by laser-based attacks let alone physical attacks.

records.name: Fladramon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from V-mon through the Digimental of Courage. Its combat skills are similar to a burning flame, and it hits its enemies with extremely strong knuckles.

records.name: Pteranomon
records.profile: An Armor-level Pterosaur Digimon with wings of steel that evolved through the power of the Digimental of Love.

records.name: Quetzalmon
records.profile: A bewitching armor-form Beast that evolved through the Digimental of Light. It is the embodiment of the sun and wind in the shape of a winged white snake.

records.name: Maildramon
records.profile: An Armor-level Cyborg Digimon that evolved through the power of the ’Digimental of Miracles’. This dragon, possessing armor made of Chrome Digizoid, is the attendant of Knightmon, and rushes about the battlefield carrying Knightmon on its back.

records.name: Lighdramon
records.profile: A Digimon who armor-evolved from V-mon using the Digimental of Friendship. It possesses the attribute of thunder and attacks its enemies with a lightning-quick electric shock.

records.name: Salamandamon
records.profile: An Amphibian Digimon that Armor-evolved with the Digimental of Courage. With its flame-clad, salamander-like appearance, it appears to be carefree, but once it’s angered, it flares up the flames of its body even more and attacks.

records.name: Togemogumon
records.profile: An Armor-level Mammal Digimon that evolved through the power of the Digimental of Friendship. It grows ultra-low temperature ice crystals on its back like a pincushion.

records.name: Honeybeemon
records.profile: An Armor-level Insect Digimon that evolved through the power of the Digimental of Knowledge. It moves very quickly due to its tiny body, and its speciality is making sport of the enemy.

records.name: Goatmon
records.profile: An Armor-level Mammal Digimon that evolved through the power of the Digimental of Hope. This Digimon, which has the appearance of a large black goat, has had the duty of guarding treasures and ruins since ancient times.

records.name: Shadramon
records.profile: An Armor-level Insect Digimon that evolved through the power of the Digimental of Courage. To be precise, it took the form of an insect-humanoid, but its form had an unfortunate adverse reaction to the Digimental of Courage and became fiendish.

records.name: Peacockmon
records.profile: An Armor-level Machine Digimon that evolved through the power of the Digimental of Miracles. When certain Bird Digimon perform normal evolution, they have the potential to become Delumon, but there are cases where they will rarely evolve into Peacockmon by using the Digimental of Miracles.

records.name: Digmon
records.profile: A Digimon that Armor-evolved from Armadimon through the Digimental of Knowledge. It has the attribute of earth. Skilled in the use of the drills on its nose and arms, it specializes in underground combat.

records.name: Holsmon
records.profile: A Digimon born when Hawkmon armor-evolved through the Digimental of Love. It has the attribute of wind, being able to flap his wings and dance in the sky like the wind. Its specialty is air battles.

records.name: Sethmon
records.profile: A Demon Beast Digimon who armor-evolved through the Digimental of Love. The Digimental of Love’s power was too great and uncontrollable, and its power was converted into the power of hatred.

records.name: Boarmon
records.profile: An Armor-level Mammal Digimon that evolved through the power of the Digimental of Courage. Reckless; it is a Digimon that exists solely to embody this word, and its legs, tail and mane are shrouded in blazing flames.

records.name: Elephamon
records.profile: An Armor-level Cyborg Digimon that evolved through the power of the Digimental of Miracles. It is a Super Digimon that overwhelms other Digimon with its large build and extreme power, and that is able to move at high speeds, contrary to its appearance, due to the gigantic turbines on both of its ears.

records.name: Ponchomon
records.profile: An Armor-level Ghost Digimon that evolved through the power of the Digimental of Purity. Although it is classified as a Ghost-type, it is an unusual Digimon that appears to be a Plant-type, as far as you can tell from its appearance, and it is rumored that when a Togemon has died due to unforeseen circumstances, it will become a Ponchomon.

records.name: Rune of Hope
records.profile: Equip this rune to a Digimon in order to increase its stats. Once equipped, the rune cannot be upgraded.
